1.content:
Choose the specific evolutionary line of pokemon to be featured in the story. (Note that legendaries should probably be in their own group, since none of them have evolutions.)

This could be a rather lengthy process if you keep cycling through the "Other" coice to reach the Pokemon you desire (Unless it hasn't been added already, in which case I encourage you to contribute. Heck, I encourage you anyway.), so I suggest "Story Outline" and your browser's search function to speed up the process.
1.title: Choices, choices

11.content: Start out with an Eevee, or with an evolved form...
11.title: So you wanna start an Eevelution

choices: The ray backfires and you get shrunk.
111.content:
You're a reputable scientist, working on ways to enhance pokemon. Your current project is finding a way to make trained pokemon larger, as to make major spectated battles an even bigger spectacle than they already are.

Your research as led you to build a size altering ray. Said ray is capable or growing or shrinking just about anything it hits, especially pokemon.

You've been given the go-ahead to use the ray on a living test subject. Nonliving test subjects have been a complete success, so there's no real chance of anything going wrong. Good thing, too, it's late at night and there's no one around.

Your test subject is a little Eevee. She's quite the docile creature, rather harmless and unintimidating. You often play with her when taking breaks. She's also generally obdient, so you figure she's the perfect test subject for the growth ray as she's less likely to go rouge once she gets bigger. You bring her to a very large chamber and you fire the ray...
111.title: Size experiments

choices: You accidentally fire the ray at her again
She thinks the ray is some kind of drink bottle
1111.content:
The ray hits the Eevee and she starts getting bigger. She was barely a foot tall before the ray hit, now she's the size of one of her evolutions. Not satisfied enough, you make her grow again. She seems to enjoy this sensation and she reaches the height of your chest. You fire yet again and he grows to your height, then several feet above you. You continue this until she nearly takes up the huge room, you even had to back into one of the walls.

The enormous Eevee looks down on you. She seems amused at the size disparity between the two of you. The then lies down and pulls you toward her with one of her paws, cuddling you.

Then...
1111.title: A huge success

11111.content:
Original Author: amanda tenoh

You accidentally fire at her again and she breaks through the ceiling and runs of now you let a giant pokemon what will you do now?
11111.title: giant evvee

choices: The Eevee grows until she destroys the lab.
The Eevee loses her interest in the growth ray.
11112.content:
Author: TheGuy

The Eevee spots the growth ray in your hands. Its large size coupled with its shape reminds her of a bottle they use to feed certain pokemon with when they're young or need liquid medicine. Thinking its a drink, she takes the end of the ray in her mouth and begins "drinking" it. you try to stop her, but no matter how docile she typically is, you're now much weaker than her and she wants a drink, so there's no way you can stop her.

As she sucks on the growth ray she winds up triggering it, causing her to grow even bigger. At this point her body is too big for the room and it pushes the walls as she grows, squishing you a bit as well. Soon the walls can no longer handle the growing Eevee they're containing and they break and fall over. At this rate the whole lab'll fall apart before too long...

(Author's note: Whoo! 100th chapter! Also: Over 1000 views! Readers: Keep reading. Contributors: Keep contributing. ^_^)
11112.title: She thinks the ray is some kind of drink bottle

111121.content:
Author: Nick Barker

The Eevee continues to grow, and the lab building can only take so much. It has a basement and two above ground levels, and you happen to be in the basement for your testing.

She soon cannot keep from hitting the roof, and it presses against it, until the roof gives way. She continues to gain height, bursting up from the floor on the ground level, frightening many scientists in the area, as it was their first time seeing a giant head of an Eevee burst upwards. The rest of her body begins to burst through the ground floor, quickly filling it, and only minutes later, the second level floors has been broken through, and finally the Eevee bursts through the roof, and the building, having lost many support beams, collapses upon itself. Luckily they had it evacuated, and you yourself made it out.

Eevee drops the ray, and you watch as it falls at least 75 feet from the air, crashing down hard to the ground. She looks at you smiling. You can't help but feel something is going to happen.
111121.title: Oversized

choices: Somewhere where she continues her growth
1111211.content:
Original Author: AshKecthum1999

The massive Eevee picks you up and takes you to...
1111211.title: Where to giant eevee?

11112111.content:
Original Author: TheGuy

After tossing you up on her head you can only watch as the Eevee trots her way over to the start of the city limits. This city is particularly large, even for a 75-foot tall quadruped.

You yourself try to make the most of the situation and simply try to enjoy the ride, petting the Eevee's head as you lie on it. It's possible she'll still listen to you, as she was extremely obedient before her growth, she only didn't listen to you about sucking on the ray because she was thirsty.

You then find yourself on a random street, people panicking and running everywhere at the sight of the giant Eevee. She may still be cute and adorable but doesn't change the danger her size possesses.

She chases some of the fleeing people. They likely think she's trying to eat them. However, she merely wishes to play with them, licking them and seeing the chase as a game. Eventually, she sees a car and paws at it. She sometimes played with random toy cars at the lab, she probably thinks the same thing's going on here. You don't want her wrecking anything, though, so you try telling her to stop...
11112111.title: Big City, Big Eevee.

choices: She's sorry for flattening the car.
Destruction is now her new favorite game.
111121112.content:
Original Author: TheGuy

You shout at her, telling her to stop pawing the car before she breaks it on accident. She doesn't seem to be listening to you. You can't tell if she can't hear you (despite being on her head, you are still pretty small to her) or if she's simply ignoring you, but eventually, she winds up flattening the car with her paw.

She then pauses for a minute, you're not sure why. What is she now thinking in that head of hers?
111121112.title: She's ignoring you...

choices: Plays with you for a while

The giant Eevee is sorry for her destructive rampage. Then, the scientists came to the city with the growth ray and another Eevee. Then, the Eevee...

You tell the scientist to turn off the machine and he said, "I'll do it!" hours have passed and the scientist finally shutted off the growth beam. Everyone looked at the massive Eevee which is now 5,000 feet tall. "What shall we do now?" you said.

Suddenly...

The Eevee's paw trips over a fire hydrant, shooting up a whole bunch of water in her face. You realize that the growth ray may have made her DNA unstable, which could trigger an evolution when exposed to the right element. The Eevee pauses for a minute and then...

As you hang on to the top of her head, you notice something strange. Her fur is thinning. When it reaches a certain point, you see her skin turning blue, and that she's growing taller still. She's evolving!

Her tail is elongating, smashing a tower block in the process. Her ears are also growing, and a strange fin around her face, forces you backwards. This is when the both of you catch her new reflection on the side of a glass building. She has a baffled look on her face. Well you would is you had just turned blue and tripled in size. Then...

She looks at you with a big blue face and decides to do her Bubble attack, but since she was so big, you quickly find yourself surrounded by a bunch of 25-foot latex-like bubbles. You seem to be able to count them all. How many are there?
1111211122121.title: She keeps going on her way

choices: Is attracted to the firey debris.
Pounces the tanks with crushing force.
11112111222.content:
Original Author: TheGuy

Tanks roll into the street the Eevee is tearing apart. You were afraid it would come to something like this. a tank fires, almost hitting the Eevee, but she quickly dodges the shot, still seeing the whole thing as a game. The resulting explosion from the missed shot causes some flaming debris to appear close to the Eevee. The Eevee then...
11112111222.title: Here comes the guard...

choices: The Flareon wants to test out her new physical strength.
111121112221.content:
Original Author: TheGuy

The Eevee takes an interest in the flaming debris left by the last tank shot. She sniffs it and then pokes at it. Then you quickly notice that she is growing again, only this time it's not directly due to the growth ray, it's being caused by an evolution! You can only guess that the growth caused her genetic structure to become even less stable than that of the average Eevee, causing her to become more sensitive to the elements and making her more prone to evolution from exposure to them.

Her fur starts becoming redder, and the mane of fur around her neck is growing, becoming a cream color and wrapping her chest in fluff. A large tuft of the same fur grows underneath you as you sit on her head. Given the ratio of growth between an Eevee and a Flareon, you estimate that the formerly 75 foot tall Eevee has grown to an astounding 220-foot tall Flareon.

Testing her newfound form, the Flareon opens her mouth and points it towards the tanks firing at her. She then breathes out massive billowing flames at the tanks, melting them and turning them into nothing more than huge black stains on the road. Impressed with herself, she breathes out a few more clouds of heat-bearing breath towards the sky. It seems nothing going to get in her way now.
111121112221.title: The tanks are nothing but toys.

1111211122211.content:
Original Author: gilbokhan

As she smashes her way down another street(She has to now, she can't move otherwise) her behemoth belly rumbles. Bugger, I didn't feed her today crosses your mind. What is she going to do? She walks slightly further on and smashes through the kitchen wall of a McDonalds. You'd sometimes feed her Chicken Nuggets from your lunch, so she'd recognise that smell. The entire place empties in 10 seconds of customers and staff. However, Flareon keeps eating for a few minutes

This food frenzy has barely made a dent in her appetite though, and after doing the same thing to a KFC across the street...
1111211122211.title: Massive Hunger

You suddenly have a solution to Eevee's hunger, you realize that you have a growth serum for fruits in your pocket, so you slide down the giant Eevee's leg and see an apple, you inject the growth serum into the apple and it grows about 25 feet in size. Eevee gleefully starts eating the giant apple and soon, she's full. She gives you a lick with a 9-foot tongue, "That solved the problem." you say as you climb back up onto Eevee. She decides to then leave the city and go to...

Flareon then breathes in through her nose, then with her exhale summons a wave of massive flames. It very quickly consumes everything in front of her for as far as the eye can see. You look on in awe as whatever was in front of you from buildings to trees now lay in ruins and flames.

Even though you can’t seem to see anything remaining ahead of you, pretty much everything behind you is untouched. Flareon decides

Then, the scientists came back with the growth ray. They told you to shrink back down the massive Eevee by turning the dial to shrink. As the scientists give you the ray but the giant accidentally turns on the growth ray. you and all of the says "Oh no" As the Eevee grows to an astounding 220 foot tall. her head is still in earth. she continued the Destruction. Then suddenly the sky turns black and thunder arrives. Then Eevee started to...
1111211122221.title: massive Eevee

1111211122222.content:
Original Author: Jonouchi

You immediately struggle to return the growing Eevee to normal size, but as you prepare to fire that beam of light, a lone tank, surprisingly unharmed, strikes Eevee hard, but with her size, it only hurt her but didn't kill her. The blast causes your reflexes to change the dial to something else. It fires due to your reaction, but it was too late. It broke with too much speed and guess what it was on: The Planet Size choice. You stare at the machine, eyes widened as the beam continues to hit the Eevee as it grows quickly, crushing all the surrounding buildings as if it was nothing, it just keeps growing and growing and growing, going through the sky as if it was lightning. Suddenly, you stop as you see the stars above you. You were amazed that Eevee was still able to fit on the earth, seeing it's the whole body over the earth with all four of its legs hanging over the spherical edges. You look at the broken ray with many questions:

What will happen now? Will Eevee return to normal size? What about everyone else, who were all being crushed under its massive size?

More importantly, why in Arceus's name did you guys even think of adding a Planet Size option to the growth ray. You remind yourself to knock the repulsive idiot who thought of the idea senseless...just then you come to a realization: You're the repulsive idiot who thought of this idea.

You shake your head as you look at Eevee, who looks at you. It didn't want to have fun since there wasn't much to do when you're resting on the entire planet. You look at the ray gun, which had the dial removed completely, as well as the marker that once pointed to Planet Size, and tries to think of a way out of this. Your only hope was to fire it in hope that Eevee would shrink back to normal. You close your eyes as you fire the beam. And as you figured...
1111211122222.title: I'm On Top of The World, Ma! Literally!!!

11112111222221.content:
Original Author: tango1

A beam of light meant to make something as big as a planet lashed out and struck your pokemon, already the size of a planet. Unfortunately, these physics didn't work that way, objects were always assumed to be normal sized and then expanded. There were other ways of course, but they didn't fit in a gun like this, they took up office buildings. Of course, it was also assumed that the user had a clue what they were doing too.

Overhead, Eevee drifted off the planet as its gravity becomes stronger than the Earths and as it grows up towards the scale of solar systems. Its body expands towards other celestial bodies, just barely missing the Earth and blocking the sun for all of five seconds before that was past it. When at last the growing ends, the Galaxy is but a few miles to the titan pokemon.

Across the Earth, people look up and see your pokemon, most people are seeing the toes and space between them as that's where the planet wound up in the grand scheme of it all. You spot a piece of grass, made huge by the growth and immediately wonder how much stuff the beam effected. Lately, your inter-galactic scale friend had been scratching a lot, fleas and bugs bigger than planets could not be good. Of course, maybe the beam could be used on you to get up there and defend the world.
11112111222221.title: Enormous Evee

choices: You grow at the same size to your Eevee

Everyone screams as overhead, a bug emerges off of Eevee's toes, against her it is insignificant, but to the Earth, its mouth is an enormous threat, not to mention its whole body. The creature looks down and seems to see Earth, if it came this way, the solarsystem would be pan-caked for good.

Eevee finally manages to shrink. You happily watch as your Eevee shrinks smaller and smaller. After hours of waiting, your Eevee is now back to normal size. Then, she feels sad that she's going to miss her new size. So, you decided to make her big again. You changed the settings to...

Eevee tilts her head for a second, then bats it with a paw. It drifted a short distance like it was made of latex. You slide down the Eevee's leg to the ground and then...

You think she's enjoying the tickling, so you keep tickling and your Eevee keeps growing and growing bigger and bigger! Then...
111121122.title: to mountains

choices: She plays with you using her paws
111122.content:
Original Author: Ilikecola

Soon after Eevee had her drink of the growth ray, she takes you in her paws and puts you on her back. You hold on tight as she bolts out of the lab. He heads deep into a large cave as shes around 3 times your size. You then look with curiosity. She soon looks at you with a devious grin probaly knowing that she was in control now. Then she speaks is a clear, yet cute girlish voice.
"Looks like I have a new play toy." She says still grinning deviously.
"W-w-wh-" You were soon cut off as Eevee puts her paw to your mouth
"Now, now, toys don't talk. Now, what should we do?"
111122.title: Eevee wants to have some 'fun'

choices: “I want you to massage them master”
1111221.content:
Eevee started gentle playing with you as some form of reward for making her feel so wonderful at her massive size. She began by bouncing you back and forth between her large paws like a cat would do with a ball of yarn, which seemed somewhat natural.

“E-eevee, p-please stop! I g-getting d-dizzy!” You said equally powerless as your current situation.

“Hehehe, dance master, dance! I always wanted to see you dance master, now I finally can!” Said Eevee as joyful as ever.

“T-this isn’t dancing!” You objected.

“Hehehe, i know” Eevee said through her giggles.

Your desperate pleas made the whole ordeal that much more funny for her as her laughing only grew louder and louder throughout, much like her body had only a moment ago.

Eventually her laughter went beyond her control as she broke the sequence when she lost focus entirely, accidentally freeing you. And after you had recovered from your dizziness, seeing Eevee in such a pure state of joy made you join in with laughter of your own, which was enough to snap her back somewhat as she picked you up and rubbed her right cheek against.

“Mmmm, you’re so nice master, i wish could’ve repay you back better” Said Eevee feeling some amount of guilt.

“*chuckle*, no need for that Eevee, showing gestures of affection is not uncommon, i’m only doing what’s natural” you said with kindness fully present in you voice.

“N-natural?! But master, have you already forgotten?” Eevee said as she placed you on the ground right in front of her feet, wiggling her toes to make her point obvious.

“Look at me master, you’ve made me huge! My foot is as tall as you master! Do i even deserve that treatment master?” Eevee said while still being unable to believe her situation.

“Of course you do, i’m your trainer after all, fulfilling your desires are part of the course. Speaking of which.....”

You suddenly approached her massive right foot and placed your hand onto it, which obviously caught Eevee off guard as her cheeks blushed crimson red.

“I sense that you have one involving your feet, correct?” You said confident.

“...!”

“It’s obvious that you didn’t put me near your feet mainly to make a point, you just want me near them, don’t you?”

“.....m-master....” Eevee said as she continued to wiggle her toes.

“Don’t hesitate my dear, just tell me what you want from me concerning this specific body part of yours”
1111221.title: Play time

1111222.content:
Original Author: Dem0nic

"Oh, I know!" Eevee says, turning her body around. You let out a yelp as her big butt smushes you against the rocky ground. Thankfully, the pink little hole on her rear doesn't touch your body, but she still feels like a heavy cushion. The fur on her butt is as soft as silk against your body, which actually feels soothing. You see her wagging her tail and a cute smile appearing on her face.

"Comfy?" she asks. "I sure am!" With all her weight, she leans on you. You still wonder how she is able to talk, then think that the growth ray might have been flawed. So not only it had made Eevee grow in size, it has given her the ability to speak in human tongue. While this is an interesting twist, you fear of what she may be intending to do with you.

"Hmm?" you hear her mumble. It is then that you feel a rumbling noise from her stomach. What can it be?
1111222.title: Squishy

choices: "Be my partner for... a special occasion."
11112222.content:
Original Author: Dem0nic

Though it is not very powerful, the flatulence comes out as if a monster has just growled. Your nostrils are filled with its sulfurous odor in which you can't help but cough at. The big Eevee giggles at her little "accident".

"Whoopsie! Must be that food you've been feeding me." She stretches her body forward slightly, her butt still pinning you to the ground, and let loose an even longer fart. It is much more rancid than the last one, stinking up the cave in no time flat. She lifts her butt off the ground, at last freeing you from your little "prison". Unfortunately, you spot a little moisture on her privates before she turns towards you with an unsettling grin. At this point, it has become quite clear on what she intends to do with you.

"Well, 'Master'--at least you are the closest to one--there is something I want you to do for me."

You stare fearfully while waiting for her next say.
11112222.title: Poot

choices: She has food for the both of you
She has a small toy ball
1112.content:
The ray backfires as you hit the button, and you are knocked out. When you come to Eevee is standing above you, looking completely flummoxed.

"Well, at least it still worked", you say scratching her chin and making her purr loudly. You look beside her and see the room you are in. It's a lot bigger than before.

"Ohh god no", you say in an exasperated voice, as Eevee picks you up with one of her paws. She then rolls onto her back and cuddles you as though you are a stuffed toy.

After about 10 minutes of this, she puts you on her back, and runs out of the room. It is now easier to estimate your height, about 6 inches. She puts you down in a corner and runs off to get something. When she gets back...
1112.title: Big Softie

11121.content:
Original Author: gilbokhan

You can see the now giant Eevee heading back towards you, with the sandwiches that were in your coat pocket, meant for your tea. There are 4 of them. You have a little bit of one, and she has the rest. There are two reasons for this. 1, she's a lot bigger than you and 2, her 2 daily meals are usually given in the period when you were out cold.

When you finish, you stroke her for bringing you food, and she immediately nudges you over gently and licks you all over. Later that night she begins to get tired and falls asleep, so you sleep on her. Her great, furry belly is warm and comfortable, and she holds you close, like the toy you gave her a week ago.

In the morning...

Eevee then starts to roll you along the ground and starts giggling. You start telling to stop but she continues and giggles some more. After a while, Eevee got bored and stopped. You take moment to catch your breath. What happens next?

choices: Go with the flow hoping Eevee will get bored and stop sometime soon.
Try to get away from her and find a way to calm her down.

You run over to the once "small" Eevee and try your best to measure yourself. You believe yourself to be about 2 inches. You feel vibrations on the ground and realize that it is your Eevee, waking up. Eevee runs over to you and starts to nuzzle and lick your now smaller body. Since it is the morning, you decided to find something to eat. You asked your Eevee to let you ride on his back, but it doesn't seem to want to stop. You then...

One day you decide to take a break by fishing at a nearby lake close to your home. You've been atching Magikarp all day, throwing them back because pokemon, even fish pokemon, are protected by law. However, you finally caught a plain, mundane fish which you can eat.

As you celebrate, you begin to notice something coming out of the water. Slowly, a Vaporeon emerges from the lake. It then notices you, or perhaps more accurately, it notices the fish you just caught.

The Vaporeon walks its way up to you. After it reaches you, it sits down in front of you, giving you what some call the sad puppy dog eyes. It seems to want to eat the fish you just caught. You...

You decide to hand the Vaporeon the fish. It looks so cute and you just don't want to see it looking so sad. Besides, you can just buy fish any time, it's not like fishing is your life or profession or anything like that.

By the time you're done thinking about it, the Vaporeon stands level to your head, looking you straight in the face.

You're still startled by the growth, but you realize that running away will likely trigger some sort of instinct and you'll probably get caught anyway. You decide to continue being friendly with the big aquatic quadruped and you begin petting it. It gives you a lick as you do this, and you then follow up by scratching it behind the ears.

While you shower it with affection (pun possibly intended...), the Vaporeon begins growing yet again, as you do this you pet whatever part of the blue beast you can reach. First the neck, then the chest, until you can barely reach its belly. At this point the Vaporeon sits down and you give its fully reachable belly a couple of pats. You then approach the Vaporeon's paw, rubbing it gently. It reacts to this, smiling. You kindly and softly begin to speak to it, commenting on its large size and how kind it is (Or at least, how kind you HOPE it is). It then lowers its head down a bit, giving you a soft lick.

Taking advantage of its lowered back and head position, you climb up on its back. It actually seems to take a liking to this, and it even seems to let you steer it around a little by gently pushing the sides of the back of the neck. You now have a ride home. You decide to cut through the woods, figuring that the faster you get back home the less likely you will be to encounter something that's not much higher on the food chain than you.

However, it's not long before you and you massive mount encounter a wild Ratatta along the way. Normally these are rather harmless and at your original size you wouldn't pay it much heed, but at your tiny size it's quite intimidating. It attacks, and the Vaporeon jumps out of the way right when its massive fangs almost take a bite out of you. Thankfully for you, Vaporeon are much bigger than Ratatta and a simple whack of its big tail is more than enough to send it packing.

You continue along, and then a Pidgey flies along, mistaking you for a worm. Yet another feeble creature made frightening by a simple altering of your size. It dives at you, barely missing, then it starts blowing a gust at you with its wings. You can barely hang on to the Vaporeon before it fires a water attack to effortlessly defeat the Pidgey.

"What's wrong Sparky", you ask him, still slightly phased.
"Jo, jo", he answers, jerking his spiky yellow head towards the front door. He always does this when there's mail.
"Don't worry", you tell him, scratching his ears,"I'll get it"

1131221122221.content:
Author: Crush 40

You hear a faint sound from your neighbors house.

It was sort of a discharged zap, and when you look, you realize that your neighbor's electricity output has been drained...


Your eyes widen in shock. That can only mean...


Without looking up, you close your eyes and mumble to yourself. "Ok, let's see, the power plant fuels the entire city at about an average rate of 55 megawatts a minute. Its rate should continue to power the city for 7 hours without recharging...."


Your eyes open in shock again. "If all the power generated from the plant is drained, then that can only mean...."


Nervously, you glance up to your Jolteon.



To your surprise, you find yourself looking up....and up......and up!


Your Jolteon has grown to monstrous proportions. You can estimate an unbelievable height of two miles! In front of you is his foot-paw, which is already at a giant height of 250 feet.

His tail wags quickly, scattering clouds in all directions.


He's so big that each of his paws is on a different block of your avenue, and crushing several houses in the process. Lucky for your neighbors, a sheer amount of luck had been upon them since his paws were considerably soft. So, in general, even in such a gigantic state, he couldn't harm anyone.

Houses and other buildings, on the other hand, were a different story.


You glance to his hind paws, and you're not getting any better results. Huge, 50 foot deep and 75 foot long craters were visible, leaving the road and sidewalk battered and ruined.


You wish you had brought a brown paper bag to hyperventilate into, regarding the fact that if it were possible to view the Earth from space, your Jolteon would appear as a tiny yellow dot in an urban area.


It isn't until now that you see your Jolteon, both overjoyed and astonished at his growth, begin eying the ground in which was barely visible to him. He's obviously worried about you, which gives you some relief that just because he's humongous, he's not going to be evil.

He leans his head down in an effort to find you, and you can't help but fall down at the rushing wall of fur that scanned the landscape with eyes three times as big as your house.

He eventually notices you, which surprises you, being a speck to him.

He smiles. "JOLTEON!"


Despite being a calm and soft voice coming from him, his voice sounds like a horde of bombers raining over the city. You cover your ears in protest.

Oddly, his titanic pupils notice this and attempts to lick you in comfort.

"N-no, boy! Don't!" You shout, desperate and hoping that he can even hear you. His tongue, the size of half of a skyscraper, halts. He tilts his head curiously.

"L-look, boy," you say, trying to regain your nerve. "I pretty sure you've noticed by now, but you're the biggest Pokemon alive! Heck, I'm pretty sure you're the biggest thing on the PLANET! I don't think it would be a good idea randomly causing damage, ok?"

He blinks. In the next second, he sits down, completely crushing the lower half of your block. His pads may have been soft and harmless, but you're afraid to say that his rear wasn't. Anything caught in its way was destroyed in a matter of one little second. The ground below you shakes, knocking down street lamps like a 5.0 earthquake.

Already you could hear the sound of the ground compacted underneath his incredible weight, and mutter about how big of a crater THAT was gonna be....


"Kind of like that, boy!" You say with a bead of sweat falling on your forehead. "That's what we don't want, ok?"

Your Jolteon only stares.

"Do you understand?"

His enormous eyes tell a tale of curiosity, but eventually, you see him smile and nod.

You sigh in relief. "Good boy!" you say, and slowly pet your Jolteon's toe, which was already bigger than your house entirely.

"JOLT!" he cries happily, forgetting his voice is too powerful for your eardrums.

You feel a little dazed, but in some weird way.....you're happy to be the owner and trainer of a two-mile tall Jolteon.

Still, you can't help but have the feeling that the military might not share the same viewpoint with you, and you begin to consider if being in the city is save for the both of you...
1131221122221.title: HUGE Jolteon!

11312211222212.content:
Author: tango

It was definitely time to leave. There would be military forces here soon and if they attacked Jolteon, well, in a fight he'd level anything in his path with ease. His feet were already big enough that he'd level stuff just moving, but an attack would be devastating. He was after all around 4000 times his former size, so he had something like the electrical power of a very powerful nuclear weapon.

"Alright buddy, lets get out of here while we can" you yell, "pick me up and head for the mountains."

At first, the Jolteon bent down like he did to pick up everything. Quadrapedal pokemon more often than not did carry things using just their mouths. Looking up, a view of fur, teeth, tongue and slobber dominated your view. When he wasn't even a meter tall you were fine with that, but at two miles, his tongue would be able to cover your whole neighborhood, his teeth were like 'little' skyscrapers and the slimy saliva could easily lead to your drowning or tour of a Jolteon's guts.

All this flashed through your mind and the bond from trainer to pokemon was enough that he seemed to know it and changed tactics. The enormous toes in front of you moved back and then suddenly the ground rocked and was carried up atop a single digit on a splayed set of toes. At his head, he held the paw out and shook until you and a good piece of your now abandoned neighborhood slid off and into the fur.

As a trainer, you expected to see weird things, but never a view of your pokemon from their fur or on their head. Weird stuff happened though, some people rode on their pokemon rather than the case of smaller ones riding on their shoulder, but at least in those cases, the pokemon hadn't been over a meter shorter than them earlier. In the next instant, the paw disappeared and like that the enormous creature ran off. Nobody was killed, but his enormous feet threw dirt and destroyed anything man-made in their path as 500 foot long and probably 200ft. deep craters marked a trail across the area.
11312211222212.title: Find a safer place to hide and avoid the damage...

choices: "Come on, boy! We gotta keep moving!"
"We're going to need to convince everyone you're not a monster! We're waiting!"
113122112222121.content:
Author: Crush 40

In only 15 minutes, your life has taken a complete change of direction.

Lying back on your now gigantic Electric Pokemon, you ponder the events thus far.


A little green ball exploded, and for some reason, it caused Sparky to grow. But how could something that small create such a big Pokemon?

"Wait..." you mutter, racking through memories. "There was....an explosion, and....."


You sigh. You're not getting anywhere. All that's clear is that your Jolteon is now twice as big as any skyscraper in the world and that you were trying to keep him to avoid any collateral damage as possible.


Sparky seems intent on this goal, as well. Despite flattening thousands of acres of the forest below his massive foot-paws, he looks as if he wishes for the same thing. You're not too keen if he wants to return to normal size, however, as you can remember how happy he looked after his first overdose of growth. For your sake, you can only hope he doesn't get any BIGGER.

Oddly enough, though, ever since he first grew, he hasn't had any other growth spurts. And it wasn't because there weren't any power lines around in such a barren land. You figured because of his size he'd be absorbing electricity from the dark clouds that loomed all around.

Yet, he hasn't, and you wonder if it's because he believes he's already big enough for you to handle. After all, if you both didn't have an unbreakable bond, he'd still be in your neighborhood wrecking havoc to anything in his path.


You feel kind of stupid at this thought listening to the trees snapping hundreds of feet below.


But you had bigger problems to think about. [Pardon the pun.]

By now, you think that everyone in your neighborhood would be reporting the sight of a two-mile tall Jolteon to the government. And with the crater-sized footprints leading the way, you would only have a certain amount of time before the military discovered your whereabouts, and that was the last thing you wanted.

It wasn't because you weren't worried about the military hurting Sparky. After all, a tank shell would probably only cause a teeny smudge on his fur.

What you were worried about was Sparky's reaction. If he were intrigued by the tiny tanks and helicopters firing at him in an effort to take down his titanic form, he would probably think of them as toys. Or worse, FOOD. You shudder at the thought of Sparky gobbling up a bunch of tanks thinking them as appetizers.

Then there's the thought of him getting angry. Never in your life have you seen Sparky upset, and you worry about what could happen if he thought of the military as enemies.


......"Best not think about that..." you say, shocked at the thought.


As you near the mountains, you can only be amazed at how quickly this was taking you. A trip by any other means, preferably by car, would take hours.

By means of riding on top of a two-mile-tall Jolteon, it only took ten minutes.


In the distance, you can see the mountains, snow-peaked and rising above the clouds. As Sparky nears them, you can't help but notice the most surprising thing about them.

Soon, Sparky notices it too, as he comes to a complete stop.


Sparky was staring up at the mountains.


After all, you've both been through, for some reason, it felt weird looking up at something taller than Sparky. They had to be at least five miles tall, towering over Sparky like a skyscraper in a city.

Even if he stood on his hind legs, he'd still only come up to halfway up the mountain. Which gives you some relief. He may have been the biggest Pokemon on the planet, but he wasn't the biggest OBJECT.


Still....that could change in an instant, and once again you're concerned about the dark clouds that loom all around you.

Due to Sparky's Volt Absorb ability, he grew to monstrous proportions just by lying on electric cables.

Lightning carries at least five times more of a shock than cables do. If Sparky were hit by that......


You know, maybe it's best not to think about that, either.


Carefully, Sparky sits down and holds you in his front paw. His reassuring smile eases you, and for once you're not as freaked out looking at his huge face.

Now for your next plan of action. You need to think of a backup plan because all of those footprints are going to lead the military straight to you.

On one hand, you could continue to find refuge and hopefully a place where Sparky isn't as dangerous to the environment around him.

On the other hand, you could wait for the military and calmly explain that Sparky means no harm...

Sparky tilts his head at your thinking face as if waiting for your decision.

After some time, you look up at Sparky and say.....
113122112222121.title: Pondering while Atop a Two-mile Mountain Ride

1131221122222.content:
Author: tango1

Electricity could be acquired a few ways, overall it was just energy. Jolteon could get it from the air in static charges and from contact with something carrying a charge. Right now, he was getting both and as he got bigger, the charges he could harvest increassed, not to mention that which he pulled through not one but now several power lines.

Right now, just one of Jolteon's toes took up your entire neighborhood. That area was a quarter mile squared and your pokemon looked at it as less than an inch. The edge of the giant's toes started just under a half-mile up, giving it a total of a half-mile for every inch. 27 inches, times a half and you get pretty much 14 miles tall if you also account for fur.

Macro-sized, the Jolteon was frightened as everything seemed to disappear to him. He couldn't see you or any familiar surroundings at his size, must of the world he knew was underneath of him. Static charges built up around him as a result of the shock and fear, not to mention loneliness as the biggest pokemon to ever live. For him, the world he knew was gone, but unknown to him it was right there.

Far below, you felt the energy off the enormous foot in front of you. Normally a scared Jolteon only made little static discharges, but these were full-blown lightning strikes. If a lightning strike didn't get you, then the aurora of electricity flowing over the giant creature would. His shocks were huge and now you had no idea what to do except try to calm him.

"Jolty! Its alright, I'm right here!" You yell, "left food, middle toe. Just don't step on me."
1131221122222.title: more????????? :o

choices: No but there was a note
1132.content: when you wake up you see that sparky is a bit larger than normal as a matter of fact everything is getting bigger exept you your shrinking! sparky takes notice of this and props you up on its back realizing his masters in danger he instinctively looks for danger was there someone behind the bomb?
1132.title: You are a bit smaller

11322.content:
Author: tango1

Sitting on Jolteon's back, you try to see outside, but cannot get a good view of it. Your only around a foot tall, so its about twice your height to the ground if you fall off the huge back. If something's bad out there, you'd have to find out but at the same time you didn't wanna leave the safety of your pet either. At this point, he was the only thing that could keep even a little kid from hauling you around like a rag-doll.

Shakily and sweating in fear, you stand on Sparky's back. He makes a very low "jo" in curiosity but then falls silent as he watches for threats and lets you do whatever the hell it is your doing. For a few seconds you manage to stand up but then just as quickly fall back down again as a wave of vertigo sweeps through when you noticed that the distances seemed to still be changing. The thought is pushed out of mind however and dismissed as an illusion brought on by your fear of dieing an embarrasing death, by falling off a Jolteon's back.

Sitting there, you notice something odd. Right in front of you there's two almost identical black marks. Each one has a main-body of sorts, longer than it is wide and ending with five dots. Around the middle of each, the shapes move to their individual inboard's in a curve. There s a slight rattle as a train rolls through town and you look away for a minute just in case that booming is another threat about to blow down your whole house.

Returning to the marks, you find they've multiplied greatly in size, spreading to cover more of the Jolteon's back. For a second, you think it could be some sort of biological weapon acting against your formerly little best buddy. As you look up you see that is far from the truth as you know have to look up to see Sparky's ears where before you could look down at them. As you examine your surroundings, you find that your legs are also no longer going over the sides as the back is now broad enough that its more flat than round to you.

Standing up, you go to walk onto the enormous head but stop as you see more black spots behind you. It suddenly rushes in, they're footprints. Yesturday, you had forgone showering and had worn sandals all day, combined with a little sweat, that turned Sparky's amazingly soft fur into a wash-cloth. The stuff though is even smoother to you know, for a second or two, you wish your whole house had carpets made like this. As you reach the head, your shrinking slows and stops at...
11322.title: Hey, big buddy

113222.content:
Author: tango1

Sparky holds as still as a giant statue, waiting for your orders and for something to happen. As you walk forward, it already is happening as things are getting bigger to you. All that your pet would have been able to safely notice though was the reduced weight on him, not that you'd weighed all that much before, it was certainly far more than now. Currently, 4 inches tall, yourself from a few minutes ago was a giant.

At the forward half of the back, you were walking through a field of fur that was at your waist and very, very rapidly climbing to pass that. By the point that you're at the shoulders, they're huge as your bare feet trod across warm skin, beneath the fur. Each tower is about 60 feet tall to you, formerly just two inches. Its odd to move under the fur like this, most people never thought about a pokemon's skin, just that it had a lot of fur.

Right on the enormous shoulder muscles, you are suddenly launched into the air, as what you take for ground suddenly shifts with a force that would have knocked over a city skyscraper. By now, you weigh in at probably half a pound or less, the pet's muscles hold up over 100 times that just to stand. Landing several feet back you look up and see the black fur from one of your footprints earlier, you weren't as big as the toe on it.

Standing up, you realize that you're lost, not sure which way is forward or back, the forest of fur around you blocks too much of the sky for you to get a good view of the head or its ears, which were really your only landmarks. The body was wider than a football field, even counting in the stadium and on top of that, the fur was so thick you couldn't see the sides if you had wanted to.

Unbelievable, you were lost on your own pet Jolteon...
113222.title: 1/4 inch

1132221.content:
Author: tango1

Being lost, there was really only one way to find out where you were. Anyone in a forest would have done this, and well, the fur was as big as trees anyway, so it only made sense. A higher view would let you see what was all around afterall, and then it would be pretty easy to walk up to the ears and get some help. The head was your objective as it seemed safer than being here, assuming you survived this next act.

Walking up to a stalk of fur, you looked up a huge climb to the top, it seemed bigger than earlier, but that was just a fear of the climb striking, that's all. There were no branches or things to help you get up there and it was perfectly smooth too. After a few failed attempts, you eventually find what appears to be a split piece of fur and use it as a rope, put it around the stalk, hold tight and use it to hold yourself against it. Bit by bit you work your way up it like this. Black footprints trail your path upward.

Through the climb, it seems as if the 'rope' is getting more and more slack, yet the 'tree' isn't getting any thinner, not at all. Soon you cannot even hold onto the 'rope', its too heavy and very quickly you end up hugging the strand of fur, its like a giant red-wood now, despite nearly being to the top of it. As you slide down, there is a quick glimps of Sparky's ears in the distance and then they're gone as you slide down to the ground, taking longer to reach it than it took to leave it

At the bottom, you find a huge black mark on the fur, bigger than you were, running the whole way up. It was your footprint. Normally, feet are 1/7 to 1/8th the size of the person, so 1/7 to 1/8th of 1/4th was around 1/32nd of an inch, and you were shorter than them, so you were smaller than that! This forest had just gotten really big, a whole lot bigger than before as now, your pet's head was probably over a kilometer away. Briefly you consider sliding down the legs, but then realize you'd have to get through 1000ft of toes too.
1132221.title: Really big forest

11322212.content:
Author: tango1

Really, your best hope is to reach the ears and then with luck the gigantic jolteon will be able to hear you. Before heading out though, you look down at your enormous 32nd of an inch long footprint, now 64 feet long, which put roughly every 2.5 inches of Jolteon at a mile and your current position on the back somewhere close to the shoulders as far as 5 miles of uphill walking from an ear.

Facing the direction you figured the ears to be in, you walked on over soft warm skin beneath your feet and feeling the movement and power of miles and miles of muscles. Figure afterall that your just barely bigger than 1/300th of an inch tall, the Latimus Dorsi, a muscle running the length of most mammals backs, would stretch nine miles. You were somewhere around 1/20,000 your normal size too, so the small 54 pounds this thing carried just to walk was literally just shy of a million pounds and you knew the creature could carry far more. So, the muscles moved vast distances as you walked over them and they lifted your near non-existent 0.0045 grams of weight. If the creature were to buck or anything you'd be catapulted off for sure.

Still however, you moved forward, what choice did you have? You needed an express elevator to get on your own flipflops, a jet to get to bed and move around, and feared just about everything in existance. Outside little kids at play would crush you or send you across the town with a single kick without knowing it, in here you Jolteon's three inch tall paws now toppled miles and could easily crush your tiny form on the floor and never now it, even a but was measured in hundreds of feet. This was going to be a long walk....
11322212.title: Forward

113222122.content:
Author: tango1

As you moved on, you noted that you were still shrinking, just at a slower rate. At this point, you were maybe a quarter of your size before starting off, but the ears were in sight, reaching 6 miles above your head. For every inch of ear, there was quie a deal over a mile and a half now. It was among your higher hopes that this would stop soon as if you got much smaller you figured that the titan would not even be able to hear you when you got into the ears.

Suddenly, there's a whoosh of wind, and you have just enough time to see the first strike. Jolteon's back leg is scratching ferociously at the ears. The enormous paw is as big as the ears and they're just a half mile away. The first few hits don't grab you, thanks to the huge gaps in the toes. Eventually, your hit though smothered under a huge sweaty pad. The gooy grime that served to cool feet, skin and more on numerous species carried you with it across miles of space. Somewhere in there, you got loose of it and free-fell for a while only to land between the mountains again, four or five miles off the ground.

Your trip just shot into the double digits of miles, a little over 2 feet tall and about as long to Jolty and anyone who wasn't shrunken, you now had to climb up the leg and cover the back for a total distance of 87 miles. With that figured it now scared you with how big a 'little' kid would be.The drop to the ground seemed small now, at least compared to the massive distance to scale your Jolteon.

People were beginning to point and shout in the streets, so you decided you should get moving. Espeon began walking down the street, shaking the ground with each car sized paw. Her tail, now 100 feet long swung back and forth with her long strides, taking out mailboxes and cars on the side of the road. Espeon seemed really happy and enjoyed being giant. Pretty soon you passed the Pokemon Center, which didn't even reach Espeon"s thigh! Unfortunately in her excitement Espeon forgot about her tail and you winced as it completely ripped the roof off the Pokemon center. People began to scream and ducked as Espeon's tail whipped around, realizing the danger. Espeon was completly oblivious to the mess she caused behind her, smiling and having a great time.
You thought it was time to find a better place for Espeon after the destruction she caused just from walking, you tell Espeon to head for the...

You look down at her face to see how she's taking this. She still seemed happy, almost oblivious to the chaos she caused even as she made her way through the city. Well if you could leave it then maybe having a giant Espeon wouldn't be so bad

11522.content: You'd been walking aimlessly through the blizzard for days, with no sign of civilization in sight. The blizzard was turning into a white-out, but you kept going. You had been followed by a pack of Mightyena, and you didn't want to take any chances by setting up camp. As you continue to walk through the snow, your vision starts to become blurry, you start felling fatigued and weak, and in seconds, you fall face first into the snow. The last thing you see is a blue blur running towards you, then everything goes black.
11522.title: You'd been walking aimlessly through the blizzard

115222.content:
Author: Traytor

You eventually wake up from your blackout in a daze.

"Where am I?" you mutter to yourself, your eyesight is still fuzzy. "Ugh, my head is killing me."

You sit up with a little bit of a struggle, and soon realize you're in a cave. The entrance was a little ways off, and there what seemed like a bed made of leaves in the corner. "Apparently, I'm in some Pokemon's cave. Must've brought me here after seeing me unconscious." you think to yourself as you look around. A few seconds afterwards, however, there's a figure in the entrance of the cave.

"Shit! Those Mightyena followed my trail!" You try pulling out your cutting knife to defend yourself, but to your surprise, a lone Glaceon appears with what looks like a bunch of berries. You quickly put your knife away as it walks towards you.

The Glaceon drops the berries and scans your body, cheering happily after seeing that you were okay.

"So you were the one that saved me, huh?" you asked it, petting it on the head. It's says its name happily in reply. It had a feminine like voice from what you could tell, so it must have been a girl. "Well, thanks for getting me out of the cold. I don't think I would've made it if it wasn't for you." The Glaceon purrs after hearing this. "You know, it seems to really enjoy my company. Is it really that lonely up here in the mountains?" you pondered to yourself. Suddenly, you hear loud barking in the distance, Glaceon hearing it too as her ears perk up.

"Damn, it's those Mightyena! They caught up!" you shout, again pulling out your knife, knowing you couldn't run from this fight. Glaceon runs out the cave towards the pack, apparently going to try and fight them off. "Glaceon, wait!" you yell to her, but to no avail. In seconds you hear a lot of savage fighting, and quickly run to scene to see Glaceon fighting a losing battle, with it being five to one. Not wanting to see the person that helped you injured, you jump into the fray.

"Take this!" you shout, cutting across the side of a Mightyena with your blade, injuring it. You continue to fight off the Mightyena until Glaceon manages to recover and help you out. Finally, after chasing off the pack, you stop and take a look at the Glaceon.

She was collapsed on the ground and breathing heavily. There were a lot of bite marks and slashes all over her body, and she was bleeding a large amount.

"Oh man, I gotta do something." you pick up the Pokemon carefully and headed back into the cave. You started a small fire, not knowing if that would help or not, and begin treating the wounds, putting antibiotics on them, then wrapping them in bandages. You feed the Glaceon the berries she picked and then lay her on her bed. She licks your hand to show her appreciation. You smile at this as she slowly drifts off to sleep.

"Guess I'm sleeping here tonight, then." you say to yourself quietly as you pull out your sleeping bag, as you too drift off into a deep sleep...
115222.title: You finally come to.

12111111121.content:
Author: lomns

You are kind of shocked to hear your vulpix, the one YOU raised, the one YOU fed, the one YOU cared for, deny something that would benefit the both of you. You start to become sad, then you become slightly angry at your vulpix for denying an evolution. You start to "nag" at him as he sits, looks down at you, not very interested. You start to try to persuade him to evolve to make him stronger. You complain at how weak he "is" (he really isn't at 20 feet tall). As you say this he lifts his paw up, you stop talking to him and duck a little.

Your vulpix reaches over you, as you watch, and pushes down a tree behind you with little effort. He then stands up, looks around to see some people coming into the park. He started to get a little nervous, he doesn't know what they would think. He runs away a few yards behind a tree. You run after him trying to convince him to come and say hi. Your back is leaning against the tree as you try to talk to your vulpix, who is standing less than a foot away from you (your head is just below his chest). He starts to crouch, not all the way down, just bending his legs, as you try to continue to talk to him.

He seems to be completely ignoring you. You push him back up (he did it voluntarily, you couldn't possibly do that by yourself) and continue to persuade him. You walk under his chest to show him how awesome it would be to have them admire his beauty, and his height by standing underneath him. As you're talking the people are starting to walk by. You start to feel pressure on your head. You start to have trouble standing up. You turn around trying to push up against your vulpix, you end up with your face pushed against his chest, as he lies on top of you behind the tree, he's trying his best to keep away from the people. You're completely covered by your massive vulpix. You can breathe, but just enough to stay alive, just slightly uncomfortable.

You admire how heavy your "little" friend is now, and how well you treated him, his fur is really soft. You begin to relax as you know he will be getting up any second now, the people have left by now.

You where walking up the mountain trail hoping to catch your first Pokemon. You continued to walk a little further when all of a sudden you hear whimpering sound coming from under a nearby crevice. You run over to where you heard the sound to find a small Vulpix. You crouched down and started to stroke the Vulpix. It let out a satisfying 'Vul' as you continued to stroke the cute little Vulpix. You asked the Vulpix if it would like to come with you, and it nodded. You slowly picked it up as it started to fall asleep in your arms.

------------Present------------

Ninetales lays down, signaling for you to climb off of its head. Once you are down, Ninetales says, "Remember when you found me all alone. I am glad you found me when you did. I couldn't have taken another minute." You sit there, staring into space as you remember all of the good times you and Vulpix, now a Ninetales, have had together. You ask Ninetales if he would like to....

1211111112212.content:
Author: lomns

You decide to take your over-size vulpix in the city with you. You don't put him in your pokeball. Your vulpix might not like it. You have a new respect for him at his size, you REALLY don't want to disappoint him. As you enter the city your vulpix has already attracted attention. You can see your vulpix walking with its nose up in the air, you can tell he's proud of himself. About halfway to the store there was a very large crowd on the side of the road where you were walking.

Your vulpix makes slight tremors every time he steps, you have a small amount of trouble keeping balance, but it's not the easiest way... As you walk by the crowd you fell the tremors stop. You stop and turn around to see your vulpix growl at the crowd as a joke then walk quickly toward you with its tail up high. That growl rattled you from over here. You have a slight fear of him now, but you're sure it'll go away soon. You continue walking. You feel the tremors stop again.

You turn around to see a child, about the age of 5, scratching your vulpix on the head with his hand. Your vulpix is adjusting his head to let the child scratch the right spot. You cross your arms and tap your foot. Your vulpix immediately looks at you then gets up, almost knocking the child off his feet backwards. You reach as high as you can, but only reach up to his chest to rub him. You then turn around, kind of embarrassed at how your vulpix, the smallest point of the pokemon's life, is much taller and stronger than you, and you can only reach up to its chest. You just walk on and the tremors start again.

You eventually make it to the store. The store just so happens (coincidence?) to be 25 feet tall, allowing your vulpix to enter. When you get in, you look at the counter toward the back then turn around to see your vulpix step over most of the aisles toward the right wall. You walk over to the counter and begin to talk to the clerk, who is looking at your vulpix sniffing the products on the wall. After a lot of distractions you finally buy the fire stone. It feels a little lighter than you expected it to be. You walk over to your vulpix, it takes about a minute to get to where he's standing in the store.

You see him nudging some giant ink pads with his nose. You figure you could leave some autographs of your vulpix behind. You buy the ink pad and step outside. You don't immediately give out autographs. You walk a ways and at only a couple points you take out the ink pad to let your vulpix give paw prints on books. Your vulpix's paw took more space than the pages in the book, so they were pretty incomplete. You gave the suggestion of having him stamp it somewhere else.

Someone randomly yelled from the crowd to have him stamp on their backs. (ink pad stamps, not stomping down on their backs when their lying down, that might hurt!) You ask your vulpix if it's okay. He nods, you wonder why he doesn't speak. You suppose he doesn't want to surprise everyone... they're surprised enough already. You line up about 10 people, have your vulpix put his paw on the ink pad, then place it on their backs. Most of the people say it tickled while some mostly commented on how good it felt. You then start running out of the city in a playful mood with your vulpix.

You start to run as your vulpix is stamping the last signature. He turns his head toward you and starts sprinting toward you, putting paw prints with his ink-soaked paw on the pavement. Within a couple seconds he was caught up with you and not even running to keep up with you. Once you are sure no one has followed you and you are out of sight you ask if you could feel how getting his paw stamped on your back felt. Your vulpix agreed. You lift up your shirt and he lifts up his paw and presses against your back. Goosebumps go over your face the first few seconds from the new feeling.

It tickled and really felt good. He held his paw a lot longer there than he did for the people in the city. He eventually put his paw down and you quickly said "Lets try this stone out!" Your vulpix responds, "Yay! I can't wait. I'll be so pretty and strong!" You get out the stone, which seems a lot lighter than before, out of your backpack. You ask him to lie down. He does so and you have to reach up slightly to place the stone on his muzzle. (you placed it there for fun) His nose is about as big as a basket ball. You wait... and wait... and wait... and.... wait... nothing happens. Your vulpix is still closing his eyes waiting for something to happen.

You take the "fire stone" off his muzzle and look at it. You grip it tightly. It's pretty firm. You ask your vulpix to bite it. He complies. When he does, it crumbles to dust. Your vulpix got a sad look on your face, while you think about that money you spent on that thing. You tell your vulpix to come on (AGITE!-that just means "come on!" in latin) and you start walking back to your house. You spent most of the money you had. After about half an hour you arrive back at your house. Your vulpix won't fit through the door so you have him walk around back.

You walk through the house then open the gate. You see him further down the fence and easily step over it. You had kind of a "..." expression on your face. Your vulpix still seems kind of upset. You walk over to him as he says, "I could have been stronger... faster... bigger..." You immediately remember about that stone. You run over to it. You pick it up and it's either scolding hot, or dry ice-cold, because it begins to burn at your hand. You throw it behind you. You fall to your knees and grab your right wrist with your left hand. You see the stone drop to the ground a few feet in front of you and slightly to the right.

You turn around to "not" see your vulpix. You turn back around, still grasping your fist and look for your vulpix. The last direction you look is up, and you scramble to you feet to find you only cover about 1/4th the distance from the ground to your vulpix's chest. You run forward to the fence that your vulpix is facing. You still have to tilt you head pretty far back to be able to see your vulpix's head. He's about 50 feet tall in your estimation! You slowly walk back over and feel your vulpix's front left leg. He lifts his front right leg in response. As you rub you look up as your vulpix's face. You then look forward to see his tail swing from your left to your right. You stop rubbing his leg and run in between both of his legs to get a good look at his tail.

Your Vulpix turns his head to see what you were doing. You tried to grab his tail to feel it. It was about two times as wide as you were. He held it still for you to pet. You then walk over to the open gate and close it. Your Vulpix turns around and...
1211111112212.title: You put on quite a show, very entertaining.

As soon as he starts talking you rest your head next to his body, and his words start to fade... you can't think straight... your eyes are drooping...

Your eyes then pop open. You look around to find yourself in your room, sleeping previously. You hear, "Get up and come for breakfast!" You open the door thinking about your "dream" and walk to the kitchen. Your parents had pancakes on the table ready for you. You sit down and look around. Your mom has a very distressed/worried look on her face, her hair is messed up. You look over to your father, who by now would be reading the morning paper, as he always does, but as you look over, he's already folded it, and is putting it down onto the table. He hides his emotions very well... well, not this time. He looks worse than your mother, which would be pretty hard to do at this point. All you hear is, "Eat, after you finish, we need to talk."

You have no clue what it was about. So you continue eating. Once you finish your father says "Come meet us in your room after you brush your teeth." You go to your bathroom and brush your teeth. You walk to your door, that's closed. You slowly open it and walk in, then close it behind you. Your dad pats the bed he's sitting on. You go over and sit next to him. "Now, I'm going to let your mother talk to you first. Then, if needed, I'll come in next." your father says. He walks to the door then steps out. Right when he closes the door your mom bursts out...

The flash made you a bit disoriented and made you lose your balance. As soon as you regain your vision, everything around you seemed a little taller than usual. It wasn’t quite noticeable at first but the shrinking process was starting to speed up. You then realize that everything is getting bigger for some reason... too big. In a matter of seconds, green blades of grass were blocking most of your vision of the house. Hopefully thinking that your shrinking stopped... it didn’t. Soon the green blades of grass was growing even taller until it suddenly stopped. Looking up and at everything around, you were amazed but also terrified at what just happened. You were about the size of an ant and was questioning if this was a dream or is it truly happening.

You walk to the large blades of grass and touch one of them. It felt quite real as you felt the fuzziness of the blade. In testing out if your still in a dream, you close your eyes and pinch yourself on the cheek just enough for it to hurt. When you open, nothing changed. You think “Is this really happening?!” You are quite frightened now that because of your small size, you are now vulnerable in getting hurt or perhaps stepped on... perhaps by your own Pokémon!

On its way trying to look for you, it walked to the back door of the house looking through the glass to find you but you weren’t anywhere. A shadow starts to loom over and as you look back up, you see the massive paw of a Pokémon come down somewhat close to you. Following that paw back up, you see the cute face of your Pokémon sniffing around the area where you are. You hope that maybe the vulpix notices you to keep you safe from danger.

1221212111221.content:
Author: lomns

"One-hundred feet, from nose to the beginning of her tails!"

The ninetails grins, then looks at mew-two.

Mew-Two responds, "How is that any easier to manage?!"

"I think it was you who asked me how big I wanted her?" You respond.

"Yes but... I said that you could manage... she could control you, just like she was doing before!" said Mew-two.

The ninetails' grin fades, as she thinks you gave in to having her either shrink or normal size.

You respond, "I want her 100 feet, and I want it now!"

Mew-two sighs then 'floats' over to the ninetails, who brought her grin back on her face. "He has made his decision." Mew-two said. "I see." said the ninetails, "I guess I'll be seeing you later." "That you will, bye now." Responded Mew-two, "Oh, and, you" Mew-two turns back toward you, "Once she becomes 100 feet, it will be irreversible--I'll make sure of it. Just to make you think about your decision." You nod, and say, "All right. I want her to be 100 feet."

Just after you say that the ninetails has a glow around her as Mew-two disappears. She then walks over to you and smiles. "Good choice." She then starts to expand over you. She's about 50 feet tall standing on all fours. You think you should have asked for her to be bigger, you meant you wanted her to be 100 feet tall on all fours. Well your wish has come true. She's 100 feet tall from nose to tails.... Premaritally, you just now begin to think about the downsides to that. You're currently standing under her chest, you only make it up to about 1/6th the way up to her chest from the ground. You sit down and start to think. She sits down behind you and moves over to your right a bit then lies down with you in between her front left leg and her body while you just think.

Once you think that the benefits outweigh the bad parts to this you notice the comfortable seat you're up against. You actually notice for the first time the* ninetails (* means that she isn't technically yours, she doesn't have to listen to you) is trying to make you comfortable, kind of like a master making his pokemon comfortable. You feel awkward thinking that thought, since you don't want to become this ninetails' pet. You look up to see her looking back at you with a loving grin... or was it?

Despite the seemingly benign nature of the impossibly massive pokemon's antics so far; you couldn't help but have a nerveous edge about you. Those humugous jaws would have no trouble swallowing you whole in an instant, and those titanic paws could crush you with little to no effort on the pokemon's part.

A slight shifting of the creature nearly caused you to stumble once more and you looked up at the Ninetails' face. One of her enormous eyes winked at you before her gigantic form vanished once more, leaving the landscape as it was and you back in the forest. Except that your friend/tormentor was no where to be found.

Actually, scratch that, judging by the two paw roughly the size of human hands covering your eyes and the feeling of furry limbs resting on your shoulders, she was behind you. You twisted in her grip to face her, ending up with the pair of you in an embrace like postion. A light splash of red appeared on the vulpine creature's muzzle as you looked her in the eyes and asked "Why are you doing this?"

"I'd like you to be my trainer." the Ninetales says.

Author: wdearth

"I'd like to tell Professor Oak about you." you say to her.

Ninetales considers it, then says, "All right, I'll go with you."

Then Ninetales expands to the size of a Rapidash and you climb up onto her back. You have to hold onto her neck tight, if you slip off, you may wind up grabbing a tail and getting cursed. She runs fast in a graceful stride until you arrive at the outskirts of your hometown. She shrinks down to normal size and then she walks alongside you to Professor Oak's laboratory.

"Hello there!" Professor Oak says. Then notices your Ninetales, "Is this the legendary Ninetales I've told you about?"

Then Ninetales says, "Yes...I am. And you'll really like what I can do."

"Whoa! A pokemon that knows how to speak the human language! That's wonderful!" he crouches down to Ninetales and says, "Well, come inside and I'll run a few tests and see what else you're capable of."

You and Ninetales go inside the lab. First, Professor Oak has Ninetales sit on a table. Professor Oak decides to examine her and then notices there's something different than a regular Ninetales.

As he's thinking that, Ninetales decides to jump off the table and grow until she's Professor Oak's height and says, "This was an ability I discovered when I was 100 years old. You should know that a Ninetales has hidden powers stored in its tails. I have gained the ability to make myself as big or as small as I want."

Professor Oak is even more amazed. "You're capable of size changing? What a great ability for a pokemon to have!"

"That's right," you say, "and I'm her trainer now."

"What a great achievement! You are the trainer of an exceptional Ninetales! Anyways, I suppose that's it for today. Bye for now." Professor Oak says.

You and Ninetales leave Professor Oak's Laboratory and then go to...

Author: rainstar9805

You draw back your hand that was just bitten. You look at the ninetails expectently. She looks at you back. Then she moves slowly forward and pokes her nose to your forehead.

"You are unusual for a human...." she begins to speak in human. "I bit you and you never even flinched. You even have the nine-tails disease now. And yet you still stay calm." You look at her questioningly.

"The nine-tails disease?" you inquire.

"Oh, yes! Certainly you must have heard the legend! That whom ever is tricked by a ninetails, then is bitten and stays, will turn into a ninetails."

"Oh.... That one. Yes well.... I've heard of tha-" you are cut off as something strange overcomes you.

"Ohhhh!!!!" The ninetails says excitedly. "It's starting!" You shake your head as you find that your hands and feet are becoming paws! Your muscles and bones begin to shape until they force you to walk on all four limbs. Soon, your ears shrink and are replaced, long and on top of your head. You shake as nine beautiful white tails explode from your backside. Your face becomes a muzzle and your skin is soon replaced by shimmering white fur.

Within minutes, the transformation is complete. You stand calmly examening your new body. You look at the other ninetails to see her eyes glowing.

"Come on!" she say excitedly. "Now that your a ninetails, you can play tricks on people like I can! Let's go!"

"Why not?" you say. But you relize something. You promised Proffeser Oak to try and find out where the mysterious growing pokemon are coming from!

Author: VDOPlus

You're enjoying the Ninetale's unique show, but there's only so much you can take before you just panic. When you see her kneeling down, apparently ready to pounce on you, you decide you've pretty much hit your limit for the day.

You turn around and run as fast as you can, expecting to feel or hear her behind you right away... but you don't. After a few moments, you risk a glance over your shoulder, still running.

She's just lazily laying down, smirking at you. Looking at her, it seems like you haven't actually moved away at all, but your surroundings indicate otherwise. Suddenly, you notice a massive white wall sliding forward on your left, far outstripping your speed. It's pretty easy to guess what's going on- you're moving pretty fast, but the Ninetales is growing even faster!

Without even bothering to get up, the Ninetails curls her foreleg in a single relaxed movement. You're swept off of your feet and onto a paw bigger than a small shopping mall. Far above, the Ninetales is grinning at you from the sky.

You see a sudden flash of concern graze the Ninetale's complexion- she must have realized that you're starting to get a little scared... It looks like she's decided to...

His voice which was the sound of ten fire alarms quietly snoozing-



.....Wait a minute.


Forest full of fur...?

Voice the sound of ten fire alarms?!


Stunned, you look at the 'Chu, who has now reached an unbelievable height!


As if on cue, he yawns, his mouth wide enough to swallow a house!


You doubt if he would really do that, but you can't help but wonder.....


Looking down at you, you are astounded by the size increase then of what he was before he went to sleep....before, he was only about 300ft!


Pikachu looks at you with a pleased and....somewhat thrilled grin, calling out with a voice that shook the very ground he stood on: "PIKA PIKA!!"

You cover your ears to avoid losing an ear drum.


Pikachu finally stands up, sending a rush of vertigo through your body, considering that he was REALLY high up at a height of 700 ft.!


His toes would be the size of little buildings, and you didn't even want to begin to think if he could fill up the streets with them.


He giggles at you innocently, his bright red cheeks looking positively adorable.

Grabbing you in his paw, but not putting you in a death grip, he slowly walks his way towards another city.

His paws start leaving craters about 200 ft. into the ground, while leaving earthquakes up to a 6.5 on the Richter Scale for a mile around.


Glancing down at the city from the boundary, he smiled. A little too anxiously, you note.

Then, the Godzilla-sized Pikachu began to....

The sensation of the soft fur all around you, that gentle leathery paw petting over your wet backside is more than enough to convince you to stay put, knowing that your Raichu will keep you safe from any predatory Pokemon that might come looking for a snack.

You're all too comfortable though and, before you know it, you've fallen asleep in your Raichu's fluffy soft fur.

When you finally awake again it's to the thunderous sound of your pet's voice, the sound alone nearly deafening as he calls out his own name. It takes several long moments before you realize that the strange yellow trees towering into the air all around you aren't trees. . . they're strands of fur.

You can't be more than a quarter millimeter tall, so tiny your pet can't even hear your cries for help or your orders for him to return to town, where you might get help. . .

At least, if nothing else, you know you'll have somewhere warm to sleep tonight, even if it is in the fur of a former pet that is now your entire world.

You hope death will be kind to you, no matter where you wind up going. You lose consciousness as you experience the spinning of the whirlpool.

You awaken somewhere in a cave. You either somehow survived, or you're in the land of the dead. As you come to, you suddenly see a huge silvery white and blue figure before you, towering over you. When your vision becomes fully clear it is easy to realize that the figure is none other than the legendary bird of the ocean itself, Lugia.

You soon come to the conclusion that you are, in fact, alive, and it's thanks to the wondrous creature that now stands before you. It must have rescued you after you became unconscious. It doesn't sound too farfetched, as many speculate that the reason Lugia keeps itself so secluded is that it was believed that the fluttering of its wings could destroy a house.
