You hardly notice the fire dragon's expansion at first, and when you feel it's form start to press against your side you figure it just was scooching closer to you. Only when you look up at it's smiling face do you see that it hasn't actually moved. The Charizard was really growing, and at a rapid rate. It's body had more than doubled in size, and growing bigger still. The Charizard seemed immensely pleased with this, and looked from it's growing body to you with a look of pure excitement.

You quickly jump up to avoid being crushed by the giant Pokemon, your mind a buzz of questions. How could this happen? How big could it get? What would this giant do with it's new size? You could only stand and watch the Charizard keep growing, partially out of fear and partially out of amazement. Even now the massive dragon was almost twice your height sitting down.

The gigantic Charizard looked down on you with a grin, happy you decided to stay. It's body rose higher and higher, covering more and more ground, everything under it crushed under it's huge butt. It's monstrous form rose higher into the sky, already past the treeline, and the ground rumbled under the titanic weight shift. Then, as suddenly as it starts, the shaking stops.

You take a tenative step forward, gazing up, up, up at the newly-giant Charizard. The massive dragon is still looking down on you, it's smile taking on a more grateful look. It startles you as it suddenly hauls itself to it's feet, shaking everything around as it heaved it's tonnage up. You can see it's head way up above, and you guess it has to be at least a hundred feet tall, as you are barely eye level with its feet.

You stand in complete awe of the Charizard's huge form, shocked speechless. It grins even wider and rumbles down at you, leaning directly overhead, castig you in shadow. It opens its mouth and...
15111211.title: Charizard begins to grow!

You get to turn into a giant Charizard!
151112111.content:
"Hey, little guy!" a booming feminine voice calls. You shake your head in amazement. Did this Charizard just talk?

Apparently she noticed your reaction, for she gave a deep chuckle as she crouched down in front of you, her huge body looming above. "What's the matter?" she joked. "Haven't you ever seen a giant, talking Charizard before?"

You're now practically stunned speechless, and all you can do is look up, up, up at the massive she-dragon and stammer, "Uhhh....no." She giggles loudly, a big grin on her face as she looks at you.

"Well, there's a first time for everything!" she says. She reaches out to you with her huge hand, and out of fear you step back, only to trip and fall flat on your back. She sighes, her breath gusting over you. "Relax, little guy! I'm not going to eat ya!" She scoops you up in her hand, her eyes playing over your form. When she's finished, she says, "Well, I don't know what you did that made me this big, human, but whatever it was, thanks!"

Still totally baffled, you sit up in her palm and reply, "I don't know how you got so big, either. I guess it must've been the fish." The Charizard-ess grins at your confusion, amused as you try to wrap your mind around what has happened.

"Hey, what matters now is that I'm big, right?" she says, reaching out to stroke you with a finger. "This is just what I've always wanted. I feel so huge, so powerful now." Glancing at your worried expression, she adds, "Oh don't worry, I'm not gonna be mean or anything. This is just really cool and all." She smiles down at you. "And now I have to repay the one who made me this way."

Glad that she wasn't going to be a scary giant, you offer her a smile. "Thanks, but I really didn't do anything." you say from her palm.

She grins and shakes her head wistfully. "Yes, you did. You gave me that fish when I was hungry. You could've ran away or kept it, but instead you let me eat it. That shows you're worthy of the reward. Besides, I know you'll want it once I tell you what it is."

"OK, what is it?'

"Your reward for growing me is..."
151112111.title: Charizardess

choices: “Why don’t we find out how we can enjoy your size” (non-sexual)
1511121111.content:
"R-really?" you say, shocked that she would willingly give herself up for you. "You want to be my Pokemon?"

"Of course!," she grins toothily at you. "I mean, you helped me out when I was hungry. Besides," she adds, raising you up to her snout and giving you an affectionate nuzzle, "I really like you. You seem like a trustworthy person, and I have to admit, you do look pretty cute at this size!"

You blush a little at her comment, and then stand up in her palm. "Sounds great! We just need to be a little careful about how we handle this, seeing as your WAY taller than a Legendary at the moment. What's your name?"

"I, uh, I don't really have a name, little guy. I was gonna leave that up to you."

"Oh, um, well...." you ponder for a moment, then, "how about... Charlene?"

She mulls it over for a moment, and her muzzle splits into an enthusiastic grin. "I like it! Charlene it is!"

She brings you up and plops you on top of her head. "So," she asks, "what do you want to do first?"

You hang on tightly as the Charizard begins to walk, each titanic step shaking the ground. Still shocked by his sudden growth, never mind being picked up, you cry out in surprise and yell, "Hey! Where are you taking me?" The fire-dragon rumbles in answer, then points in the direction he is walking. You look and see your house on the horizon, its expansive yard merely a speck in the distance.

If you weren't utterly baffled before, you are now. How could he possible know where you live? You ask him this, but the Charizard just chuckles and keeps walking, crushing the forest beneath his feet. You arrive at your house in a short amount of time, thanks to the giant Charizard's massive steps. He plucks you off his head with two fingers and places you next to it. You watch as the Pokemon gets down on his hands and knees, each movement sending quakes everywhere. He then proceeds to inspect your house, like a curious child would inspect an anthill. He reaches out to pick it up, and out of fear you cry, "Stop!"

His hands freeze where they are, and he looks down on you, puzzled. "You can't pick it up." you continue, now much more apprehensively. You don't want to upset something bigger than a skyscraper. "You're too big. You might break it." The Charizard seems to consider this, then nods in understanding and backs away, falling back on his massive butt with a huge BOOM! You can't help but laugh as he shakes the ground. Who knows, having a giant Charizard around might be fun.

The Charizard sees you laugh and smiles, joining in with booming chuckles of his own. He leans down and scoops you into a palm, marveling at your small size. You look up at his billboard-sized face, grin back and say, "So, big guy, what do you want to do?" The Charizard...

"I...well, I guess I can now!" he says with a grin, still confused as to how all of this is happening but happy about it nonetheless. "I guess it's a good thing, right?" You wince a little at the sheer volume of the colossal Charizard's voice, but you manage to smile back at him encouragingly.

"Yeah, this is pretty awesome." you reply, leaning back in his hand and taking in his magnanimous form, still in awe at the sheer size of the Pokemon. "It's not like I get to meet a huge, talking Charizard everyday." The Charizard's thunderous chuckle rattles your body.

"Hey, it's not everyday I get to be this huge!" he says, looking down at his surroundings, intense curiosity glinting in his eyes. "Everything's so small now. I mean, look at you! I can hold you right in the palm of my hand!" He sighes contently. "It just feels so good!"

"This is really cool." you add, getting to your feet and leaning against one of his fingers. "So what should we do now?" The Charizard seems to consider your question again, a thoughtful expression crossing his features.

"Well," he says after a moment. "why don't...

After a bit of struggling, you catch yourself one of the biggest non-pokemon fish you had ever seen, and you are proud of yourself.

You look at the now-resting Charizard, who seems content. You go to add your fish to the pile, and you see that all the other fish are gone.

"Charizard, did you eat my fish?" He shakes his head nervously, and then points to a bird overhead. "Do you really expect me to believe one bird ate all my fish?"

He trys to show that the bird was big, but the Charizard belches mid-explaination. "I knew it!"

1521.content:
As a trainer on your way to your first big match, you need every advantage you can get with your Squirtle. The two of you have been training for weeks, getting him plenty of exercise and feeding him a proper balanced meal of berries and nuts.

But when a new TM falls into your lap, an experimental training machine that's said to be the most powerful water Pokemon technique around, how can you not teach it to your loyal pet? You'll be unbeatable!

As usual, to practice the newly learned maneuvers, to teach him the ultimate in precision and control, you have him use the attacks on the person he wants to harm the least in the world; yourself.

That logic, unfortunately, might prove to be your undoing as you have him unleash this newest attack.

"Okay, boy. Get ready . . . and. . . Tsunami! GO!"

You're instantly blinded by a burst of high pressure water that nearly knocks you out of your shoes! You stagger backwards, your head swimming. How could any squirtle, even with this kind of technique, produce THAT much water?

Unfortunately, the question is answered when the attack ends, and you see that the mythical Tsumani technique causes. . .
Where will this story go next? Your choices are below...
1521.title: Squirtle training

choices: Squirtle, let's go to Professor Oak's lab. He can help.
Another blast of Tsunami might reverse the effect. Let's try again.
15211.content:
Original author: quinny-coon

The blast of water knocked you flat on your backside, sliding across the padded floor of your training room. As you sit there, dripping, you can't help but marvel at how big the room seems, your mind racing as it tries to cope with the fact that you've been blasted down to only 6" tall!

Your Squirtle, just over twice your size now, scampers over towards you on all fours his blunt muzzle bumping gently into you as he voices his concern over your predicament. "Squirtle! Squirt Squirt!"

Shivering and soaked, you scramble to your feet, your shoes squishing in the puddle as you lean against the soft curve of your pet's face for balance, still blurry eyed with confusion. The attack was certainly powerful, but how in the world will you get back to full size?

With a sigh, you stroke your pet's cheek, knowing only two options are available.

choices: You make it to Professor Oak's lab

You softly stroke the side of your Squirtle’s cheek. “Let’s go see Professor Oak, Squirtle. He just might be able to help us out.”

“Squirtle! Squirt!” your Squirtle nods in agreement.

Your Squirtle gently lifts you up and places you on the back of his head. You hang on as he begins to dash outside of your training room. As you are heading out, you briefly remember that you built your training room in the forest slightly outside Pallet to ensure that there wouldn’t be any interruptions in your training with your Pokémon. If you remember correctly, your training room is not to far from the professor’s lab. It shouldn’t take Squirtle to long to reach it.

The passing scenery jars out of your thoughts. You notice how much this forest looks larger to you. Even though normally Squirtle’s speed would be about average compared to any other Squirtle, your current size makes you feel as the landscape is just whipping quickly by. You even take the time to be fascinated at how the trees seem to stretch out like huge skyscrapers. Your feelings turn quickly to the current mess you are in now.

“I hope I don’t have to stay this size forever, Squirtle.”

“Squritle squirtle squirt squirtle.” responds your Squirtle, as it tries to express its concern for you.

You kindly pet Squirtle's head, as a thank you for its uneasiness for you. Suddenly, after a few minutes of running through the forest…
152111.title: Traveling Through the Forest

choices: You have come up with an interesting strategy
1521112.content:
Original author: hitozaki

“Fearooowwww!”

Suddenly, you feel yourself jerked off of Squirtle’s head. You try frantically to free yourself but come to the conclusion that you are tightly caught in the clutches of a giant Pokémon at least more than eight times your size. You try desperately to scream out, “Squirtle, up here!!!”

Your Squirtle finally realizes that you’re trapped in the claws of a wild Fearow, who is curious at your current size. Without hesitation, Squirtle fires a Water Gun attack directly at the Pokémon.

“SPLASH!”

The Fearow swings around and aims a piercing glare into Squirtle eyes, “Rrrow!”

Squirtle steps back at the sight, but begins to regain his composure remembering the trouble you are in. All of a sudden, you can feel yourself plunging at a rapid pace. You realize Fearow was going in for an Aerial Ace attack. At a blazingly fast speed, the attack connects with Squirtle. You watch in anguish as your Squirtle is thrown back, crashing into the ground.

Knowing no limits to pain, Squirtle begins to pick himself up off the ground. You sense that this is the perfect time to give Squirtle a command.

“Squirtle! Tackle! Now!” you shout at the top of your lungs.

Quickly acknowledging your order, Squirtle turns around and charges directly in at Fearow. Just as it looks like he caught him off guard, the Fearow quickly counters with a Tackle himself. It used Mirror Move! Squirtle rebounds from encounter and slides back onto the ground, waiting for another command.

“Use Rapid Spin! Quick!”

Squirtle sinks back into his shell, launching the fierce attack. Yet, the cunning Fearow dodges the attack using Agility, making himself faster and Squirtle miss his target completely.

‘No way!,’ you think to yourself. Up until now, you’ve tried every attack except for "that one". You glance at your Squirtle as it gets up again. He’s winded as he is trying to get his footing. ‘This can’t go on for much longer,’ you think as you watch Squirtle. You’re down to your final options. You don’t know what effects a second application of Tsunami could have on you, but something has to be done and quick. The last thing you’d really want is to become a plaything for this Fearow.
1521112.title: Caught!

choices: Fearow is reduced to a tenth of its size

Original author: hitozaki

Uneasiness fills your stomach as you are left with no other possible alternatives. Without hesitating your call out to your Squirtle, “Squirtle! Tsunami! Go!”

Squirtle looks at you hesitantly, with apprehension filling his face. He shakes his head in opposition to your command. You recognize that Squirtle doesn’t want to put you into more danger, but if nothing is done it’s not going to make a difference.

Fearow senses the conflict in Squirtle’s emotions and rushes in with another attack. You can feel your body plummeting at a speedily rate as if you were on some sort of crazy rollercoaster ride. Before Squirtle could come to his senses, Fearow strikes a devastating Drill Peck that sends him hurtling into a nearby tree knocking it down with the extreme power of that attack.

“Come on. Squirtle! I appreciate your concern for my safety, but you’ve gotta use Tsunami! Now!” you yell out.

Even through all the pain he has endured, Squirtle still refuses to use Tsunami. Instead, he tries to hit Fearow with a Water Gun attack. Yet, again Fearow easily evades the Squirtle’s desperate attack. Seizing another opportunity, Fearow dives in and hits another critical Drill Peck attack, send Squirtle spinning into the ground and smashing into another tree.

You can no longer bear the pain and torture Squirtle is suffering. Abruptly, you scream out, “Squirtle!!! You have to use Tsunami! It’s our only chance!”

The Fearow lands on the ground with you still tightly held in its grasp. It gazes upon the downed Squirtle and begins to laugh. You look up in fear as the Fearow turns its attention to you as its potential victim. Just as it looks like Fearow is going to do something, you notice that there is moisture floating in midair!

SPLASH!!

You and Fearow are instantaneously blinded by a gigantic surge of water. The sheer force and pressure of the water frees you from Fearow’s grasp and knocks you away from him. As the water recedes, you marvel at the magnitude of that attack. You’re dazed as you try to get back up to your feet.

You have no idea what had just happened to you, that is until you regain your senses to see that…
15211122.title: The Last Resort

152111222.content:
Original author: hitozaki

You couldn’t begin to believe it. You are standing soaking wet in a dense forest of tall grass. It seems the effects of Tsunami are repeatedly applied as you stand dumbstruck at another one tenth your size. You figure that you have to be a little more than a half an inch high! The shock and awe of your new situation begin to fade as you remember that the Fearow was also hit by the same attack. More out of curiosity, you run around in the grass searching for the Fearow to see if it had also been reduced to a tenth of his size.

There he was lying stunned in grass. The Fearow that tried to make you his slave had indeed been shrunk from the attack. Still to you, he was eight times your size. The surprised Fearow, which was almost just a mere four inches high, stands in place gaping upward. You start to wonder exactly what Fearow was looking at…

STOMP!

Suddenly, the ground quakes beneath your feet. You can barely keep your footing. Realizing this, you jump to one of the grass stalks and hold on. The ground constantly rumbles as whatever it is gets closer.

STOMP!!

You notice out of the corner of your eye that Fearow tries to escape, however he is caught midflight by an enormous blue foot. Crashing to the ground, Fearow becomes pinned beneath the giant foot.

“SQUIRTLE!”

You clasp your ears at the resounding roar of your Squirtle’s voice. Gazing up, you are astonished by the sheer size of your Squirtle. He had to be at least 160 feet tall to you! That’s about 33 times your own size! You can tell that Squirtle was irate with Fearow right now. Even though it would be interesting to see what Squirtle was going to do to Fearow, you boldly dash out and try to get Squirtle’s attention.

You yell as hard as you can, “Squirtle, I’m down here!”

It’s no good. You are way too small now that your voice isn’t even audible to Squirtle. You look on at the Fearow as Squirtle goes down to snatch him from under his foot. Fearow tries to break from Squirtle’s grasp, but just like you moments ago is unable to. Squirtle begins talking to the Fearow.

You run towards Squirtle’s foot, and without thinking begin to pound on it. The huge flesh of the foot vibrates as you try to get your Pokémon’s attention.

“Squirtle?”

You successfully get Squirtle’s attention, but you notice that the look on his face is more of bewilderment than of one of recognition.

1552121.content:
The Gardevoir looks over to you, she then begins to walk/float over to you. Once she gets directly in front you you, she inspects you a bit. She seems to be taking a look at your clothes, gear, etc, poking around a bit and even examining some things with her hands.

The green-haired beauty then smiles, taking you by the hand over to a nearby field. You go along with this without any hesitation or fear, possessing the knowledge that most Gardevoir are very docile and don't attack humans unless they have a good reason to.

Once you and the Gardevoir reach the center of the field, she stops. She lets go of your hand and then moves away from you a bit, facing the opposite of you and looking at the sky. She then turns around to face you with a rather welcoming smile on her face.

The Gardevoir then begins glowing with a blue aura, not uncommon for psychic type pokemon when they use their abilities. However, she does something you've never seen a psychic ever do before; she begins growing. When she's finished, she's about twice her original height, a little over 10 feet tall.

You don't know if it's some psychic wave of thought from the Gardevoir or just gut insctinct talking, but you get a warm feeling from her, somehow knowing that despite being about 2 times taller than before (And therefore about 2 times taller than you) that she won't harm you in the slightest. You do wonder how she could have done this at first, but then you remembered that Gardevoir have the ability to distort dimension to some degree. You think that perhaps she found a way to warp space in a certain manner that could cause her to change her own size willingly.

The Gardevoir then sits down, leaning her body to the side a little. She seems to be motioning to you to sit in her lap. You oblige, and you sit in her lap without any difficulty. She then starts petting you, starting from your hair and going down your back. You then lean on her body with your side, leaving you back exposed for her petting. It is also said in the Pokedex that their power peaks when their trainer is in danger. But standing in the palm of this giantess, you knew what was going on was the furthest thing from that truth. You peered over one of the large digits of her hand and seen the drop if you fell. Ooh boy, you think. Thankfully the wild Embrace Pokemon was so friendly and protective. Knowing you were safe made you relax a bit. She sat back down continuing to look at you affectionately as you tried to make sense of this. Those red eyes seemed to shine with her own psychic power. Using a finger she patted your head like you were a pet. Did she think that?

Or maybe she considered you as her trainer now? The entire evolution line could sense a human's feelings and would hide from those unworthy or hostile. Plus a pokemon that could do this would be impossible to beat in a battle or contest. Not wanting to offend Gardevoir, any change in her attitude could spell big trouble for you, left you hesitant to openly ask. You had to admit just being like this made you happy and she seemed just as cheerful being around you.

But before you could act upon your thoughts, your stomach growled. All that walking made you famished.
"Um…" you start but the psychic green giantess knew and shimmered in blue light again. You figured she would grow again, but she remained at her current height. Instead you heard in the distance a loud rumbling then a rip. Native flying pokemon fled from the disturbance. Turning around, one of the trees was floating toward you. This left you stunned, clearly seen by your wide eyes. Just how strong was this Gardevoir? You backed up, making sure not to fall off your high perch, as it hovered over her open hand. Numerous fruits and berries were on its branches. It suddenly shook like a Machamp was holding it. Soon there was enough on her hand to feed for days. The tree quietly floated back and sunk back into place roots and all, showing no indication it was uprooted at all.

You took a few fruits and sat back down, facing her. That large face continued to smile back. It is still hard to believe that only moments ago you two were nearly the same size. Waiting patiently for you to finish, Gardevoir remained completely motionless. She really took every effort not to harm you. The blue light continued its glow around her.
When you finished your fifth fruit you couldn't take anymore. You soon found yourself light as air. The giant psychic moved you to her shoulder with her powers. Effortlessly, she tossed all the leftover food into her mouth. It dawned on you she thought ahead. Continuing to exert this much power, though you couldn't tell but by how collected the pokemon remained, must have made her famished.

Now that hunger no longer had your thoughts. You wondered about her thoughts. More importantly did she see you as a trainer, pet or what?
155212111121.title: Food For Thought

1552121111211.content: Looks like this Gardevoir wants you to be its trainer, so you get out a pokeball and immediately catch her in it. You immediately release her from the pokeball. Then...
1552121111211.title: Trainer of a great big Gardevoir

choices: Takes you to the nearest town or city
15521211112111.content: Gardevoir giggles and grows even bigger! She keeps growing and growing until she's 100 feet tall! She sees that you're amused by this power of hers, so she...
15521211112111.title: She grows bigger than before.

1552121111212.content:
The giant psychic Pokemon gently moves you onto the back of her hand, then slowly raises it to her face.
She smiles at you. You feel momentarily unnerved by her massive face, but then you smile to.
You suspect Gardevoir views you as...
1552121111212.title: Pet or.....

15521211112121.content:
You then suddenly realise the truth; she is regarding you as a pet. While initially embrassed, you're relieved this means you aren't lunch.

The Gardevoir seems to be reading your mind and picked up the part where you figured you were her pet. She smiles and nods, nuzzling you again. You blush slightly as you sit relaxed on her palm. Her large red eyes are sort of scary at first, but they seem to glow at you. It's both comforting and intimidating.

You feel that being her pet could be alright after all; she seems to take care of you. However, you have the feeling she might think you're a specific sort of pet. Could it be a personal pet that she cares for like a child or a slavery pet that she wants for herself in exchange for her care?

Could she be that malicious?
15521211112121.title: Gardevoir's Pet?

15521211112122.content:
Sigh... fine. If no one's gonna say it, I will!

...Do you have the strangest feeling that your gigantic pokemon friend thinks of you as, dare I say it.... A MATE?!
15521211112122.title: THE or...

choices: You can't go through with this...
Play along... and see where this goes...
155212111121221.content:
Funny. The feeling you get with Gardevoir, the way she treats you, the unique vibes she's giving off. You just cant quite put your finger on it... it doesn't feel like act as dominating to think of you as a pet, yet she doesnt act as submissive to think f you as a trainer... It's almost as if.... nah! Don't be silly!
But if you're not her pet and you're not her trainer, what are you?

Finally, after a moment of staring into her smile, she closes her eyes... grabs a fold of her dress and curtsies... and then in an instant, her hand grabs your tiny arm. Then she removes the hand under you and grabs your other arm with it! 'What is she up to?' you think to yourself despite the fact she can probably hear you! The answer comes into view when she pulls your tiny right arm straight and begins moving toward that direction!

After a couple of steps, you feel the world around you spin as she quickly turns around and continues stepping to the right! Finally, she stops, then pulls your left arm straight and begins stepping to the left! Once again, after a couple of steps, she spins around once more, making you even more dizzy!
The embrace pokemon continues smiling with glee as she releases one of your arms and twirls around for a few seconds, and vice versa! ...Is she dancing with you?! Well, you know this type of pokemon is known for dancing, but this type of dance feels strange to you... and judging by the blushing on her cheeks, it's more than a simple dance!

You don't recall hearing anything about this on a Pokedex, however you do recall watching a Discovery Channel special on the behavioral habits of a Ralts' lifestyle about when a Gardevoir and Gallade express their true feelings toward one another through a type of dance that... signifies... that... the two... are... OH!!!!

"SSSTTTTOOOPPP!!!" you shout off the top of the lungs! Sure enough, she stops in her tracks and looks down at you questionably. Lots of questions raced through your mind, but you couldn't slip any of them out of your mouth! All this time, could this... creature really have a thing for you?

"W...wait a sec!" you stutter, "Uh..uh... the... this dance...does that... uh.." You couldn't manage the courage to say it out loud to Gardevoir's giant-yet-serene face, yet you were able to think out the words just fine! 'Does that mean you consider me as... a mate?!'
Judging by the way she tilts her head, closes her eyes, and smiles while blushing, that isn't a 'no'! Hoo boy...

"But...but... I I I'm... a..." again you cant muster the words out of your words, so you say it in thought! 'But I'm a human!!! And your'e a pokemon!!!' Unfortunately, she just stares blankly at you for a few seconds and blinks. This is probably her way of saying "...So?"
Oh man... THIS changes things! Your colossal pokemon friend has a crush on you! In fact so big a crush, she'd do a little mating dance with you!! And if it wasn't shocking enough, she's around 50 feet tall!! That could kill you...

You do admit, she is very beautiful for a pokemon, but she is a POKEMON! That might not work out. But then again, Gardevoir is a very kind hearted and caring being. She treated you very comfortably and took very good care of her tiny friend. That kind of thing is exactly what you look for in a good woman (a good HUMAN woman!). Plus, you'd be lying if you said you didn't enjoy that kiss!

Besides... rejecting someone or something 10 times your size is easier said than done! And being someone that specializes in Psychic powers, she could obliterate you by just thinking it! Just your luck, eh?

What are you gonna do?
155212111121221.title: The Forbidden Dance

1552121111212211.content:
Dizzying though it is, you can't help but enjoy the dance. But you can't seriously let this go on, can you? I mean shes pretty and all, but shes a Pokemon.. and besides you don't think its... practical.
"Hold it!" you yell. She looks at you a little confused. You don't know how your going to do this. Her large eyes make you feel nervous
"Look... uh....your very pretty and all but..." You try to maintain your composure, though its hard with her massive face frowning at you "I-Im sorry Gardevoir I-I don't th-think this can work out.. I mean your a Pokemon and I'm a human .. soo..uhh..."
She stops, holding you in mid air and you seen her frown deepen. You worry about what might happen next...
1552121111212211.title: The hardest rejection you ever gave?

15521211112122112.content:
Rejecting someone, regardless of species, is never an easy thing to do! But you had to do what you had to do... The laws of nature are very strict. Gardevoir is very intelligent. Surely she'll understand! She doesn't seem like the type to lose her temper over such trivial things... at least you hope not!

Good news is she's not mad. Bad news is that expression on her lovely face isn't anywhere near happy! Your humongous ex-love interest's frown couldn't be bigger as her eyes began to water.
*Sniff!* *SNIFF!* She sniffles a bit as she tries to keep a straight face... but more and more tears continue to run down her cheeks. You can hear little gasps coming out of her mouth... It's official. You have just broken Gardevoir's heart!

"P...Please don't cry," you try to comfort her, "It's... it's not you, it's me! I-I cant be with you... we are both far too uh.. different from each other. It wouldn't work out." No good. She turns her head away from you and begins sobbing. Gardevoir even covers her face with her arm and sobs.

Yikes... you knew it was tough, but you didn't think she would take it THAT badly! But then again, maybe you should've after all the two of you have been through! Human or pokemon, she thought of you as a close friend. Heck, close enough to be considered 'The One'!
And now your gigantic happy-go-lucky dancing friend is now brokenhearted.

And if you thought THAT was painful, being a psychic pokemon, Gardevoir has a difficult time keeping her state of mind in focus, because her emotions are getting the best of her! This causes her body to glow several colors at a constant rate! First blue, then red, then yellow, then blue again, then purple, then yellow again, then red, then-
*KKKKKRRRRIIIIIIPPPPP!!!*

Suddenly, the trees all over the forest rip right out of the ground and are sent flying all across the land! Each single tree rips out of the earth and soar through the sky and land in several directions all over the place! And judging by the bizarre auras flowing around them as they fly... it's caused by the sobbing giantess you are at the mercy of!

You can overhear the screams of terror from the poor innocent people and pokemon running for their lives. At this rate, it wont be long before the entire forest is accidentally obliterated by the unstable psychic energy. It's no longer safe for you here... you hate to think of it, but it looks like you'll have to break free of your new friend and try to escape this forest with your life!

Then again, you know the real reason why all this is happening! And you might know the one solution that will fix this mess and possibly put a smile back on Gardevoir's face... Question is, are you Oz-Matik enough to do it?
15521211112122112.title: What's love got to do with it?

1552121111212212.content:
Almost as soon as you decide to 'play along' you begin to feel a tingling sensation. "Huh?" you say as you attempt to look down at yourself. Notice the word attempt. As in you tried but failed. The only thing you can look down enough to see is the back of your hands. Unfortunately, that was enough. The bones in the back of your hands have begun to form spikes that are starting to pop through your skin! You faint, and for good reason.
-------------------------------
"Unnngggg, what a weird dream," you say to yourself as you get up. You have a huge headache.You reach up and touch your face. "Hey! What the..." you had noticed that something was odd about your hand... It wasn't a hand anymore. It was a blue paw with a black part on the back and a large white spike coming out of the black part.You cuss, loudly. Running to a nearby stream you look at your reflection in the water... Apparently, Gardevoir had taken your "But I'm a human" comment a little to literally. 'Cause you weren't human anymore. You were a Lucario.
1552121111212212.title: Unexpected Changes

choices: Ask her to change you back.
Tell her you like the new you!
15521211112122121.content:
This was the appropriate time for an unrationalized outburst.
"Fuck!" you whispered obscurities under your breath, "Fuck fuck fuck fuck! How did THIS happen?!" To you, this was practically the equivalent of getting a sex-change! You were still enjoying being a guy so far and you were still enjoying being a human being so far!! Thankfully, you got to keep your uh.. male traits. But still, your'e no longer a HUMAN male, but a pokemon!

How would you ever explain this to your friends and family?!

Speaking of friend, the moment you turned around, you saw a humongous pale face with green hair staring back at you with those red-eye of hers. Sure enough it was your friend Gardevoir kneeling down at you, but it still took you by surprise!
"WAH!" you jumped back. Gardevoir looked at you with an apologetic frown on her face.

"Oh, I'm sorry! I didn't mean to startle you," she spoke... IN ENGLISH! Her voice sounded cute, lovely, and angelic at the same time. You never noticed how heavenly a voice she has until now. But still! SHE TALKED!
"You... you... you can speak English?" you asked her. Unfortunately, she shook her head, "No. You're actually speaking Pokemon."
So you're actually communicating with her in a pokemon's language. You're probably justing "Luca! Luca....rio!" but those are actually words coming out of your mouth!

"Um... Ms. Gardevoir," you try to ask as politely as possible,"Why... why am I... a pokemon?" The Embracing pokemon answered you a rather soothing tone that kinda calmed you down a bit, "Well, you were rather cautious when I tried to express my feelings toward you because of a trivial issue," then smiled a little, "so I simply got rid of that trivial issue!"

"Well... if that's the case," you reply, "why didn't you change me into something more uh... 'suitable'? Like a Gallade?" Unfortunately, that question caused your giant pokemon 'mate' to stand up and turn her head away from you while frowning, "My... my heart was broken far too many times by Gallades... every one that I've met claimed they loved me... but it's not too long before each one finds a much prettier Gardevoir and dumps me on the spot!"

"I'm sorry," you apologized. Poor girl. It seems that Gallades never keep the same mate for too long. Such is the way of 80% of the animal kingdom...
"Besides," Gardevoir looked back down at you, "I um, read your mind. Lucarios are your favorite type of pokemon, are they not?"
"Well, second favorite if you know what I mean!" you answered her with a sly grin on her face, hoping it might cheered her up. Judging by the way she blushed and giggled, mission accomplished!

"But still..." she sounded serious, "perhaps it was a little rude of me to change you without asking. If you want, I can change you back..."
"No, it's okay," you try not to be rude, "I mean, sure this might take some getting used to, but-"

"It's alright. I understand," she interrupted you, "if you don't want to be a pokemon, I wont make you."
Well... in a way, you feel flattered that she chose you to be a suitable mate for you. And of course, due to certain circumstances, it was understandable she turned you into a pokemon.
Still, yo'ure a human. All your friends and family wont even recognize you like this!
On the other hand, maybe it wont be so bad being a Lucario. You would like to test what kinda special moves you got firsthand. Who knows? It might be fun being a pokemon!
15521211112122121.title: A heavenly voice from a heavenly gir-uh, pokemon!

155212111121221212.content: "No really, I kind of like being a Lucario!" you say to Gardevoir. Gardevoir smiles and begins to give you a crushing hug. "Ohhh, I'm so happy!" she says. As a Lucario your body is designed to withstand even the strongest attacks, but even that isn't enough to protect you form a 50 ft. Pokemon's hug! "Gardevoir... *gasp* I can't...*gasp* breathe!" you wheeze. Gardevoir loosens grip on you a bit. "sorry."
155212111121221212.title: Living as Lucario

1552121111212212121.content:
You cant stay mad at this lovely lass! Although at this point you can count your blessings that you're as strong as a Lucario, because if you were still a human, you'd be dead. But still, you just cannot stay mad at Gardevoir. She is just too... adorable!

Not only that... but you seem to think of her more beautiful than ever. Deeper than just finding her beautiful. You actually find her attractive! Her looks, her heavenly voice, her intoxicating scent, everything!! Could this be some sort of side-effect of being a pokemon?

Speaking of which, Gardevoir looked up toward the starlit sky... "It's getting late. Are you feeling tired?"
"Uh, yeah a little," you answer her. Once again, the embracing pokemon smiled at you, "Goody. I have a little surprise for you!"
"Surprise?"

She raised her hand as a strange aura started to glow around it. By the looks of the direction she's looking towards, she must be concentrating on that group of trees a ways away. But whatever for? Your answer comes quick as a big object comes flying out from those trees and gently lands right in front of you...

It's a bed! A nice, warm, cozy, king-sized bed! Out of curiosity, you jump on it! It feels so great and snug... whatever type of material it's made out of is heavenly! Almost as heavenly as-
"How is it?" Gardevoir asked you.
You lie down on the bed embracing the comfy feeling against your back. "Oh, it's just great! Thanks a lot, Gardevoir! You're the best!" Your humongous friend simply tilted her head and smiled at your response! Isn't that so thoughtful of her? You get to sleep in style! It's not everyday a giant pokemon actually offers you a nice luxurious bed to sleep in. But one big question came to mind...

"Where'd you get it?" you ask her. That question actually snapped her out of her little blissful state! She went from happy to nervous in about a microsecond.
"OH! Uh... um... well... while you were still out cold, I..." her eyes were rolling all over the place as if she was hiding something, "...I borrowed it-*YYAAAAWWWNN* Wow... it is getting late! How about we continue on down the road tomorrow?"

"Yeah, sure," you pay her 'borrowing' no mind. Although you kinda feel sorry for whoever she managed to steal it from. Oh well!
Gardevoir carefully laid herself down on the ground trying to keep any tremors to a minimum and rested her head against the grass as the head of hers was staring down at you.

"Nighty night!" she smiled once last time before she closed her red eyes and dozed off. "Good night," you whispered back to her.

At this moment, there's still something from earlier you cant shake off. Now that you're a Lucario, you seem to have whole other feelings inside you. Not just physically, but emotionally. Mainly, involving how much more... interested in Gardevoir. It's almost as if.... you're in love with her!

....Nah! It cant be! You're probably just getting sick or something. Maybe you'll feel better after you sleep. Who knows? Maybe you'll even wake up from this weird dream!
1552121111212212121.title: Good Night!

15521211112122121212.content:
You're almost asleep when you hear a strange howl in the distance. It sounds familiar... You hear it again, but this time it's louder and clearer. It sounds like something along the lines of: "Hey guys! I just saw a couple of Pokemon and they look they'll be fun to 'play' with!" But why was it a howl? That's when it hits you. You're a Lucario so you can understand any Pokemon's language. And only two species of Pokemon would be howling at this time of night, Houndour and Houndoom!
You jump off the bed, ready to wake up Gardevoir, but you don't get the chance to. As soon as you touch the ground, several Houndour jump out of the brush! They growl at you, obviously annoyed that you're awake. All of a sudden, one leaps at you, its eyes blazing! Before you realize what you're doing you slam the Houndour back at the pack, with the spiked side of your paw! The Houndours have stopped growling out of total astonishment. After a moment of hesitation, the Houndours decide to make tracks. However, the one you slammed doesn't move, and you can smell the blood coming from the wound you caused. Your stomach growls all of a sudden, and a strange thought enters your mind. You try to ignore it but you just can't. The Lucario part of you wants to feed, and there's no stopping it.
15521211112122121212.title: Under Attack!!!

155212111121221212122.content:
You just cant help it. You're an animal. And you gotta do what you gotta do to satisfy your animalish cravings. Still, you were a human once... a part of you remains civilized.

Eating raw flesh sounds a little barbaric. But you ARE hungry.... AH! Cook it! Maybe that might seem like the most civilized thing you can do. Too bad you don't have an oven for even a frying pan with you. Just a shame Gardevoir didn't steal one of those, too!

Looks like you'll have to rely on building a fire to cook your food. This is a forest, so it shouldn't be too much of a problem finding what you need. First, you're gonna need wood to make a campfire.
No problem. There are trees all around, so feel free to make your selection!

A quick idea comes to mind. There's a special attack you wanna use on a tree, but you're not exactly sure how to pull it off. Being a Lucario for the first time ever in life, you're not exactly experienced. So you just gotta guess! You clench your spiked fists tight and try to concentrate... concentrate...

Your hands are glowing! It looks like it's working! You slowly open your palms and continue your concentration. You can feel surges of energy flow through your hands... finally, the energy surges combine and form a ball in between your hands! No time like the present.
"AURA SPHERE!" you launch the ball in the direction of a tree!
*KA-BOOOOOOOOOM!!* The second it comes in contact, the ball explodes and bursts the tree into flames! The thundering sound echoed all throughout the land.

And yet, it STILL didn't wake up Gardevoir! Oh well. While she continues to sleep, you take advantage of one of the little embers on the ground.
After you consider the dead Houndoom to be nicely cooked, you take a bite out of him...
He actually doesn't taste that bad, but you cant help but feel a little sick. Not because of the taste, but because of what you've just done! You've killed another pokemon viciously and are actually EATING it! You're kinda thankful Gardevoir didn't see what you did, even though she probably wouldn't mind. If anything, she'd probably want you to share the Houndoom with her!

After a few bites, you stopped eaten. You're finally starting to feel a little fatigued. That little fight you had with the Hounds must've took something out of you. Now you can finally put that relaxing bed that your giant friend was so nice enough to give you to use!
You lie back down on the big bed and relax. It feels so good. Drifting off to sleep wont be such a problem anymore.

Especially with that nice warm blanket over you. ...Wait a minute. There was no blanket on the bed! Gardevoir only brought you the mattress! Then what is this big soft green thing over your body?
...Oh! It's Gardevoir's hand! Aww... she never was one to resist showing you affection. You turn your head to look at her big lovely serene face only more....
155212111121221212122.title: A 'LITTLE' more civilized!

choices: You wake up in a place that's pitch black
You wake up near a volcano
1552121111212212121222.content:
SHE'S STILL ASLEEP! This would be one of those 'slap yourself in the face moments.' Anyway, you may as well take advantage of the 'affection' Gardevoir just displayed for you. It doesn't take very long for you get to sleep...
----Inside your Dream------
You open your eyes. Looking around you see that you're on around that splits into two paths, one towards a volcano and the other toward what looks like a giantblack space..."wha- Where am I?" you say to yourself as you get up, "Is this a dream? It feels so real..." ... <Which path will you choose?> "What the- Who are you? Show yourself!" ...Nothing. "Might as well get this over with." You pick a path, but before you can even step forward a strange creature appears and says, "Your path is chosen!" and attacks!
----Real World----
You wake with a start. It's morning. You're still in the forest and still a Lucario. "Was that just a dream? It was so real.. so vivid.." You can still remember everything about the dream, which is unusual... Almost as if.. <Something important is going to happen?> It's that voice again!! <Soon you and Gardevoir will be going to the place you picked, whether you like it or not..> Suddenly, something hits you, hard. Hard enough to knock you out.
1552121111212212121222.title: Creepy Alert!!!

15521211112122121212221.content:
Everything dark. Nothing can be seen. You cant even see the ground you're standing on.. but that's mostly because you cant move. No sign of your friend, Gardevoir either... where is she? Or more importantly, where are YOU?!

That voice you heard earlier must be responsible for sending you into this pitch black abyss. You want to get up off the ground and try to find a way out of this darkness, but you cant seem to move a single part of your mouth. You want to scream out for help, but you cant even muster the strength out of your vocal chords!

Since you cant move and you cant speak, there's only one thing you can do... nothing. Not a damn thing! Just stand there in silent... and wait... Wait for what? Who knows.

...It looks like you waited long enough. You finally managed to make out something glowing in the darkness... two things, actually. A huge pair of white glowing eyes... staring your direction. Before you could ask yourself who's eyes those are, you manage to make out something else: A huge set of shining white razor-sharp jaws underneath those eyes, opening wide!

You'd scream.... if you could. All you could was just watch. Watch the jaws descend on you!!

***********************

"AAAHHH!!!" you wake up screaming, finally able to scream again! Noticing your new surroundings, it looks like you're not in that darkened place anymore. Could it have been just a bad dream? ...It didn't seem like it was just a dream.
Eh, worry about that later! Right now is your big enough problem. Everything around you seems to be whitish colored. Not only that, but very uncomfortable!

You seemed to be squeezed from both sides by big soft, uncomfortably cushiony white walls. If that wasn't bad enough, your legs are pinned between these walls and a big red soft protrusion just between your legs giving you added discomfort!

You first act of instinct is to struggle. You toss and turn while trying to push these soft walls away from you.... but you immediately stop when you see who those 'walls' belong to!
You look upwards to see a certain familiar head..... Gardevoir's head! Thankfully, she's still asleep, so she isn't noticing that small little guy... between her breasts!

It wasn't like you never noticed them before. After all, she's a humanoid female pokemon! But now, you're caught in the middle of them! Great... she must've rolled on top of you in her sleep and knocked you out after you woke from that dream about the mysterious voice! That would explain the pain you're feeling!

Still, you'd rather be in THIS pain than the pain you might be in if she finds out you're in her... 'personal space'! Perhaps now would be a good time to think of a way to sneak out before that happens...

NOPE! Too late! Her head is moving.... her neck stretches it back as she opens her mouth to let out a loud yawn!
*YAAAAAAAWWWWWNNNN*
After a few seconds of rubbing her eyes, they immediately glance downwards toward your direction.... and widen with shock! Judging by her dropped jaw and blushing cheeks, she can see you!

Terrified of how she'll react to your perverted situation, you take your hands off her 'walls' and start apologizing! "Uh... I.. I'm sorry! I am so sorry! I did not to uh... I'm very sorry!" You mentally prey to god she doesn't kill you.. regardless of the fact she can probably read your mind! Damn, why'd it have to be a psychic?!

Finally, after almost an hour (or probably just a few seconds) of staring at you with her jaw dropped, Gardevoir's shocked expression finally changes to...
15521211112122121212221.title: Thought it was scary ENOUGH?

choices: No, I'm just not ready for this yet!
155212111121221212122212.content:
Finally, the shocked expression on her face fades into an intrigued smile.
"My, my! Aren't we forward?"
"No, it's not that,,, it's that, ah,,, I was, and..."
She raised a giant finger and brought it over your lips (well, your muzzle), her smile broadening into a grin.
"There's no need to be shy. I think we both know what you were after. It's perfectly natural."
Natural? That's... not the word you would probably use to describe your current situation... but you can't deny that you're feeling very... excited.
"After all, you've just gone through a pretty major change. You're probably feeling some new emotions. Or maybe feeling them more intensely?"
She brought her hands up to either side of her chest and slowly began to grind them together in gentle circles, with you still smack dab in the middle. If you were excited before, right now you're absolutely-
Wait! What are you thinking?! You only just met this Gardevoir, and you're now a Lucario! And if that's not enough, she's nearly ten times your size!

But you're starting to like being a Lucario... and the way you've always felt about Gardevoirs... not to mention the way your new feral side is getting turned on by full-body breast massage...
You can tell she's hoping you're ready to take the next step. Are you?
155212111121221212122212.title: Misinterpretation, or... ?

1552121111212212121222122.content:
On one hand, it's not exactly violating any laws of natural order or anything like that! She's a pokemon, you're a pokemon (NOW anyway!), and the best advantage to not being human is you don't need to have to put a ring on her gigantic finger first!
But then there's the other hand: You are very very small. She is very very big. Even if you were up for up, there is not much you could possibly do to her. But there is plenty she could do to YOU!

Besides the fact that it could kill you, you're still new at this kind of... relationship. Maybe it'd be best to slow things down.

"Uh...um...I...well....I....I..." it was hard trying to get the words out while the sides of her soft and uncomfortably comfortable boobs were constantly pushing against your tiny body! Gardevoir even giggled at the look of speechlessness on your face! At least you HOPE it was because of your face, not because of the little 'kickstand' between your legs you're trying to keep down!

"L...listen.." you take a deep breath and start, "I'm... I'm just not ready yet!"
Her grin changed to a look of concern as she tilted her head and asked, "But... why not?"

15522222222213211111112111121211.content:
Zoroark lightly chuckles at your eager suggestion, “I'd rather not waste my time with that,” he said.

You were incredibly shocked to hear Zoroark say that, “Really? You honestly don’t want to do anything?” you ask, not believing him.

“Nope, nothing.”

“Not a foot rub or kissing or licking, or even a nice thorough butt cleaning?” you ask frantically.

“I’m not in the mood for something so childish,” he stated.

You were flabbergasted, “Really?!” you ask again.

“What’s with you?” he said laughing, “Do you feel a need to be dominated by a Pokémon that badly?”

“Well… it's just that no-one else has denied the chance to do it before,” you say dejectedly.

“Hey, don't take it personally. I'll play with you plenty when I feel like it. Who knows, I might even be in disguise as someone else,” he said.

You sit down, “Alright, suit yourself.”

Zoroark follows and sits alongside you, “Why do you even like being dominated so much?” he asked.

You shrug, “I don't know,” you answer honestly, trying to reason with your fellow Pokémon, “It just feels so good to be made insignificant for once. I don't feel as much unnecessary pressure.”

“But why willingly become a foot and butt toy for any Pokémon that has the opportunity to do that to you?” he asked.

“I don't know. Just something about Pokémon's feet and butts make me so happy,” You start to explain, “I just want to curl up under them and stay there for the rest of my life.”

“Well, I’m not in the mood for that now, but I can get you someone who is,” Zoroark said, smiling.

“You don't need to do that.”

“I don’t mind and besides I have to meet up with Lucario anyways. I’ll get you someone who can give you a real good time,” he says, leaving the house.

You sighed. You really wanted to do something for him but it’s nice of him to get another Pokémon willing to play with you. But who does Zoroark get for you?
15522222222213211111112111121211.title: Really?!

After a few minutes of waiting, you soon see Luxio coming looking toward your direction.

“So, Zoroark told me that you wanted someone to play with you and I got a nice idea on how we can do it,” Luxio said, smirking, “I want you to treat me like a god while you lick my feet and my amazingly stinky butt!”

Dear lord, it was wonderful. It was completely unlike any other smell you'd ever smelled before and you wanted more! After finishing massaging his toes, he lifts his other hindpaw up.

“Lick my soles clean and make it quick! Your rubbing took too long!” he demanded.

You begin to lay on your back as he puts his paw on your face. You got a stronger whiff of the smell perspiring from his feet. The smell was pretty strong for a small cute Pokemon like Luxio but you loved it. You begin to lick his huge dirty blue paws, lapping up all the sweat that stuck there from yesterday. You press your tongue between his toes licking all the little specks of dirt and crud you could find. After you did the same thing for the rest of his paws, you move to his rear.

“Slave, I have enjoyed my feet rubbed and licked clean, but you were very slow and you deserve a punishment,” he says sternly as he begins to sit on you. You were easily pinned by Luxio, his butthole just inches away from your face, “Since you were very slow, you are going to get a stinky punishment!” Luxio began to let out a fart. It smelled putrid in a way where you could not enjoy it at all.

“My god, please let it make it up to you!” you protest, trying your hardest to push Luxio off, not wanting to smell his awful farts.

“It's too late for that slave, this will be your punishment until I am done!” Luxio said firmly before he let out a longer and stinkier fart, causing you to push twice as hard, but it was no use. After Luxio let out one last fart, he sighed as you continued to struggle under your dark and smelly prison. Luxio soon gets up and turns toward you, “Now I'm going to find someone else for you to serve!”

You continue, “And any bug crushed under your feet should give praise for that privilege. Any being tortured by your paws should be considered the luckiest beings alive,” you say struggling from the tightness of your 'hug'. “The gods themselves are not worthy of even being in your paw's presence.”

155222222222132111111121111212111212.content:
You're suddenly ploughed over by a large mass of fur and pinned under a filthy, mud stained paw. Above you was the smiling face of Eevee, the newest addition to your Eeveelution family.

“Hey Uncle!” he greeted happily in his young innocent voice. You smiled; he was just too adorable for you to ignore him. You'd figured you could just entertain him for a second before you were on your way.

“Hey Eevee,” you replied warmly.

“Can we play a little?” he asked excitedly.

“Sorry but I have to ask Miss Mew an important question now,” you reply with a frown.

“Ahhh. Well can we play after that?” your Eevee asked, his eyes showing an expression of hopefulness.

“Of course! And I'll make it extra-long,” you assured him, smiling.

“Okay! But can you at least come say hi to my brothers and sisters? We didn't see you at all yesterday,” he said, giving you his signature puppy dog face.

You concede, “I guess I could but only if it's really fast.”

Your Eevee squealed. “Yay! Hold on tight!” he says, taking off with you still under his paw. After being slammed into the ground for quite some time, the two of you finally arrive at your destination. You drop down from Eevee's uplifted paw gasping for air after having it knocked out of you so many times.

“Everybody! Uncle's come by to say hi but it has to be quick! He has a question for Mew, I think he's gonna propose!” Eevee shouted out to his siblings. You hear chuckling coming from everyone as they came to greet you and Eevee.

“I doubt that Eevee. I don't think that'll ever happen,” your Umbreon said in his normal teenage voice, before he turned his attention to you, “Hey Uncle. Sorry I missed you yesterday but I was too tired.”

Everyone else gave similar remarks as they all came over. Jolteon jumped up and down as he greeted you next with a little more energetic voice than Umbreon, “Same here! We missed you sooooo much!”

“You two are so lame. He deserves better greetings than that!” Espeon said, in her calm but seductive voice. She snuggled her cheek against you, “Hi Uncle, I missed you the most! I just want to cuddle with you all night long!”

“You're such a butt kisser!” Vaporeon answered back with an equally adorable voice, “Uncle appreciates just a simple 'hello'. Isn't that right?” she asks, licking your whole face.

“Both of you are wrong!” Flareon interrupted in her warm, loving voice, “Uncle likes a wordless greeting with just a small sign of affection.” she rubs her nose against your chest for a few seconds before she was tackled down by Sylveon.

“Or maybe a huge amount of affection!” the pink fairy Eeveelution happily chimes in as he plants a huge kiss on your body.

“I don't think it really matters,” you say, not wanting to take a side in a pointless argument, “I'm sorry about not spending time with you guys yesterday. I apologise.”

“No worries,” they say all at once.

“You just go ahead and ask Mew your question,” Espeon said.

“We can all play later,” Vaporeon reassures herself.

“Now go ask Mew that question!” Jolteon encouraged, urging you forward with his paw.

Do you make it to Mew without interruption?
155222222222132111111121111212111212.title: Talk About Timing!

1552222222221321111111211112121112121.content:
After a bit of a walk, you make it up to Mew's paws. Even though you wanted to stare at her huge, pink, dirty paws, you had something else on your mind.

“Uhh, Mew?” you say, trying to get her attention. Mew soon looks down at you with her always smiling face.

“Oh, hey there. Do you want to play with my cute paws again?” Mew says looking down at you smiling a bit.

“I wish but Unfortunately no...” You reply, "I wanted to ask you a question."

"Ok then," Mew says, using her Psychic to put you on her belly while looking at you. "What's the question?"

“I was wondering... if I could...”

“Yes?”

“If I could stay at this size...”

Mew giggles a little at your request, “Well, I figured this would come sooner or later… but I will be happy to keep you at that size but you must do something for me and my friends.”

“And what's that?” You ask.

“If we could stay with you. We never had someone as caring as you before.”

You blush when she said that and that only causes Mew to giggle again.

"Sure thing," you say happily.

Mew was about to fly up and cheer, but looking at you reminded her that you probably wouldn't like heights while moving really fast up in the air. She regained her composure and stared into your eyes.

"Well, since you're here, do you want to play with your cute goddess?" Mew asks, “Or would you want me to get another one of your Pokémon right now?”

155222222222222222222222222222311.content:
Author's note: Major thanks to thelaconfir, halflord, and heythere for the original chapters. I wanted to try and slightly rewrite it so that all the spelling and grammar mistakes are fixed while adding a little more descriptive transformative content so I don't feel like I'm directly copying from someone else. Still, it's still mainly the same as you remember it. Anyways...

---

You were just an average person living in a normal world. You didn't have any magical powers, or immense power, or a wanted poster with your name plastered on it. Instead, all you really had was just typical nerdy teenage boy stuff like Pokémon plushies, football jerseys and piles of manga books stored on your small shelves of your bedroom. You've always been a huge fan of the Pokémon franchise, but you also had a secret fascination for their feet. Every time the show was on, you spent most of the time just staring at the paws of whatever Pokémon was featured in the episode, barely paying attention to what Ash Ketchum and co. were currently doing.

You had no idea how soon you would change your mind…

One day you were strolling around in a nearby forest, when you came across a huge blue shimmering circle, about five metres in width and length. Curious, you touched it and it felt like water. For a second you thought about running home and telling somebody about it, but there was something alluring about this strange occurrence that urged you to come closer.

Following your instincts, you tense yourself and walk right into the shimmering circle. Suddenly, you were swirling around in a big purple vortex! Twisting, falling, and falling… until moments later, you were spat out of the vortex and you hit the grassy ground with a soft plop in the forest. You waited for your blurry vision to stop shaking before you stood up and looked around.

You were in the world of Pokémon. You could see poochyenas frolicking and taillows flying… but there was something wrong. You were watching them as if... as if you had shrunk! You looked around again, at the trees, and noticed that they were indeed much bigger than you were comfortable with.

There wasn't even any time to take this realisation in as your ears picked up muffled stomps coming towards your position. You turned around slowly, and saw a giant Treecko and his green feet. His looming presence came closer with every step and with him unaware of your position, you were worried that you might get squished. But the Treecko just kept on walking and suddenly, the big, green foot was hovering above you. Paralysed, you said a quick prayer hoping for a quick death.

Luckily for you, the Treecko sensed something – he stopped and stepped back. He looked around before his eyes locked onto your tiny self. The Treecko knelt down, his right foot just in front of you.

“Hey there, little bug! Wanna get to know my feet?” Treecko exclaimed. He shuffled his foot forward, his sweaty toes cushioning the whole of your body except your head, “I've been waiting for ages for something to be squished under my soles!”

“Wait! Treecko! Don't squish me!” you pleaded, “I'll be your friend! I'll… I'll even be your slave!”

You held your breath, hoping this had worked.
155222222222222222222222222222311.title: BIG Green Toes

choices: Run away and get as far as you can
Accept your fate as the Treecko’s foot pet
1552222222222222222222222222223112.content:
You just realised what the both of you had just said but could you have said anything worse at the time? Well it kept you alive for now but you were dreading the foot licking part. Treecko lifted his foot at a slight difference before pushing them together with you in-between them.

You were mainly afraid you were going to fall as he stood up fully and began to walk to the cave he spoke of but now all that was running through your mind was the stench. With Treecko's toes pressing on you, you couldn't see, and what little air you can breathe was filled with sweat. You knew things were only just the beginning though since he said he was going to 'let' you lick his feet and you were beginning to lose fresh air as the grip of his toes was so tight. You felt like you were about to pass out, but soon you felt your back being pounded by the rocky ground and you were just wishing and hoping that the Treecko had arrived in the right cave before you lost consciousness.

He released you from the grasp of his sweaty toes and now lifted his foot a bit, giving you the freedom to look around your surroundings. It was pretty dim but you could see that the cave was damp and at the same time rugged, nothing like what a grass type Pokémon should live in but more of a rock or ground type. You tilted your head upwards and stared at him helplessly.

He responded to your look by sitting down and shoving his two dirty green feet on your face, “Go on! Ya know they are not gonna lick themselves?”

You looked at the sole of his foot and stared further; yes, they were extremely filthy. Still, a job had to be done and you didn't want to piss off a giant Pokémon who could squish you in a second. You brought your tongue out from your mouth and slid it across a small portion of one of his toes as he wiggled the other two. You could taste the nastiness and sweat built up in his foot but it was unmistakable how much Treecko was enjoying the treatment. You let more of your tongue slide out and graze against his dirty sole and your stomach was churning but you knew you had to keep going since your life was dependent upon it. Meanwhile, the Treecko seemed to be in deep thought looking down at you as you licked and caressed his dirty feet. Eventually, he moved his foot away and looked at it; his foot was almost spotless!

The Treecko gave you a smile, “Yep, I think I'm going to keep you!”

You looked at him and decided to…
1552222222222222222222222222223112.title: “Alright, I'll take you to my cave and yo...

choices: Stay and wait until he comes back
15522222222222222222222222222231122.content:
At first, your instincts screamed at you to run but you realised you had no chance escaping him at your size. You didn't want to get stomped into paste so you decided to accept your fate as Treecko's slave.

“Hey little bug,” Treecko broke the silence. He sat down and extended his three-toed feet towards you, “It's time to kiss my toes!”

You flinched at his demand. It wasn't exactly a strange thing to do in context and you know how much you love Pokémon feet but you were still reluctant to follow through. Treecko noticed this and inched his toes closer to your face, playfully trying to get you to make out with them.

“Don't be shy!” Treecko quietly assured you, “I know you want to kiss them really badly!”

You feel more relaxed by his words so you pucker up your lips and slowly lean towards Treecko's huge toes. The smell was horrible but also rather enjoyable to you. As your lips touch one of his toes you felt an urge to vomit but for some reason you became even more addicted to his feet. You could taste his slimy foot sweat but with it came the sparks of pleasure that shot through your body. His toes felt so incredibly soft, and slick with your own saliva and thick with sweat. Once finished, you looked up and saw Treecko's relaxed face, clearly enjoying every second you were devoting to him.

“Ahh bug, that was nice,” Treecko complimented before standing up, “I think I'll call for my big brother, he's gonna love you hehe.”

He walks deeper into the cave, what do you do?
15522222222222222222222222222231122.title: Accept your fate as the Treecko’s foot pet

choices: Lick them, remembering how much you loved Pokémon feet
Snap out of your trance and run away
155222222222222222222222222222311221.content:
It was embarrassing to admit but you loved smelling and licking Treecko's feet. It got your body shaking from excitement and honestly, you craved more of that sweaty smelly goodness.

Fortunately for you, Treecko came back quickly with someone else. You quickly noticed the slightly bigger silhouette next to the familiar sight of Treecko's own shadow as well as the echoing sounds of footsteps that were more intense than Treecko's. The figure came closer and soon you were able to recognise him as a Grovyle. The two Pokémon stops in their tracks, mere inches from your position.

“Is this the bug you told me about?” the Grovyle asked.

“Yup!” came the cheery reply from Treecko, “Well, I'll let you two have some alone time together! Goodbye bug!”

Treecko walked out of the cave, presumedly to get in contact with another of his various Pokémon friends, leaving you stuck with the Grovyle. Oh well, that just means a new set of feet to lick and worship.

“So, human,” said the towering figure of Grovyle as he leans down to get a better look at you, “I hear you're a foot person, is that true?”

“Y-yyes,” you stuttered nervously.

“Oh, don't worry little bug, I'll be gentle hehehe,” said the Grovyle before a sinister smirk formed on his face. He takes a seat on a nearby rock in front of you looking at your tiny form, thinking of ways to make your life miserable. He definitely wasn't going to be as nice as Treecko.

“Ahh, I know,” Grovyle said as he extended his feet towards you, “you can rub my feet!”

You slowly walked towards the massive feet while Grovyle encouraged you to engage in some foot action. He wiggled his giant toes, clearly in an attempt to lure you closer. So, you then…
155222222222222222222222222222311221.title: Grovyle

choices: They’re gonna sandwich you between their feet
Bow to them and beg for mercy for whatever they might do
1552222222222222222222222222223112211.content:
You walk towards his feet and start to massage them, stroking your hands slowly against the Grovyle's giant sole. His green soles were surprisingly soft and with each motion you took, you secretly took a big whiff of his smelly feet.

“Little bug,” Grovyle moaned.

“What is it Grovyle?” you respond.

“How did you end up here?” he asked.

“I don't know,” you admitted, “I was walking down this forest when I saw some weird-looking portal. I was walked through it and found myself shrunk down and then Treecko just found me on the ground.”

“Well you shouldn't worry about it now, just continue rubbing my massive feet.”

You continue rubbing Grovyle's sweaty sole, but this time using your own head to rub up and down. Feeling brave, you open your mouth and licked a little bit of his foot sweat. Oh my god, his foot tasted better than Treecko's! You couldn't stop yourself smiling as you taste it, lapping up the salty liquid that was oozing from his green feet. You loved it, and it felt like your enjoyment was spiking heavily upwards..

“You must really like feet,” Grovyle made an observation.

“Yeah… especially Pokémon feet,” you say, hugging his massive smelly sole.

“Ooh that feels nice,” he says laying down, “Treecko was right about you.”

You elicit a small chuckle, “Hehe yeah I guess he was.”

The foot massage went for a few minutes longer and you loved every second of it, rubbing and kneading as best as you could. You couldn't believe your luck; if you lived in a world where you were a foot slave to all the Hoenn Pokémon, it's be like pure heaven. The experience you had with your face buried in Treecko and Grovyle feet was something you wouldn't trade with anything in the world. But you wanted more…

“Hey Grovyle,” you ask, still rubbing his foot.

“Yes?”

“May I… may I…”

“Yes, little bug? Go on, spit it out!”

“Can I kiss your toes?” you request nervously.

“Sure, I don't mind,” says Grovyle as he lowers his feet so you can reach his toes. Without any hesitation you sniff his toes before you pucker your lips and start kissing his pointy toes. You found it so surprisingly delicious that you didn't even notice Treecko walk back into the cave to where the both of you are.

“Well I see you guys had some fun hehe,” said Treecko. You stopped kissing Grovyle's toes and turned around to your first master.

“Yeah, you were right about this bug, he can't get enough feet!” said Grovyle.

Treecko rested his hand on his chin, trying to think up of an idea, “Hmm, hey Grovyle, come over here. I have a plan.”
Grovyle walks over to Treecko and they both start whispering to each other, sometimes chuckling and laughing to themselves.

“Oooh, that's just cruel!” Grovyle says which causes you to get worried at the thought of what they could possibly be planning.

“Well if he loves feet this much then he'll love this!” says Treecko. They both walk over to you with devious looks on their faces. What do they have in store for you?
1552222222222222222222222222223112211.title: Rub his feet

info.brief_description: Pocket Monsters? Yeah, right. Non-anthro macro goodness inside!  (The Reboot)
info.description:
Here's a re-upload of the old Giant Pokemon interactive. Some of the newer chapters were not saved in the backup provided to me by user Ryupen. Hoping some of them will be added back like the charmeleon story line ^^

Note: Until the full story is back, any new additions that conflict with prior submissions will be moved onto a separate story line (as a 3rd or 4th option).
If anyone wants to help me put things back together, here is the backup Ryupen sent out. https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B3_oRUbkjaSqdFlfSTZJenRacVk

(Also, I can't credit individual authors with their chapter additions, so here's a general thanks to everyone who contributed to the story over the years!)
